Conversation/Tutorial/Line00212=若要提高可用單位的最大值，你必須建造補給站。選取一台太空工程車並按左鍵點選「建造建築」。 /// To increase the maximum number of units available, you must build supply depots. To do this, select an SCV and left-click the Build Structures button.
Conversation/Tutorial/Line00213=接著按左鍵點選「建造補給站」，再按左鍵點選任一處來放置該補給站。 /// Left-click on Build Supply Depot and left-click anywhere to place the Supply Depot.

LoadingScreen/Help00=按下<k val="AlertRecall"/> 即可將鏡頭移到最近所發生的事件，例如戰鬥警告或最近所訓練的單位。 /// Press<k val="AlertRecall"/> to center the camera on a recent event, such as a combat warning or a recently created unit.
LoadingScreen/Help01=按下<k val="ControlGroupAssign1"/> 鍵即可為選取的單位設定熱鍵，之後只需再按該<k val="ControlGroupRecall1"/> 鍵就能回到先前選取的單位。 /// You can store a unit selection by pressing<k val="ControlGroupAssign1"/>. Press<k val="ControlGroupRecall1"/> to recall the selection.
LoadingScreen/Help02=按下<k val="SubgroupNext"/> 可在選取的單位中進行類型切換，這樣一來要使用不同類型單位的能力時會更方便。 /// Press<k val="SubgroupNext"/> to cycle through different types of selected units, making it easier to use their abilities.
LoadingScreen/Help03=處於較高地形的單位在進行攻擊時，能避免自身遭受反擊。若要反制此情況，可將部隊移至坡道或派遣空中部隊隨行，以取得可進行反擊的視野。 /// Units on higher ground can attack without endangering themselves. To counter this, gain vision of the attackers by running up ramps or bringing air units.
LoadingScreen/Help04=薩爾納加監視塔可監視一片廣大區域。派一個單位駐守在薩爾納加監視塔附近來控制它。 /// Xel'Naga Towers provide vision across a large area. Stand a unit near a Xel'Naga Tower to control it.
LoadingScreen/Help05=摧毀岩石即可開闢新的路徑。 /// Rocks can be destroyed to open up new paths.
LoadingScreen/Help06=你終將用盡起始區域的所有資源，擴展新的資源區以獲取額外收入。 /// Your starting area will eventually run out of resources. Expand to new resource locations to secure additional income.
LoadingScreen/Help07=在遊戲初期就將勢力擴張至新的資源區的風險很高，不過有時候這筆額外的收入的確值得你冒這個險。 /// Expanding to a new resource location early in a game is risky, but the extra income is sometimes worth the risk.
LoadingScreen/Help08=武器和裝甲升級會影響現有和未來生產的單位，因此對戰的時間越長，這些升級所累積的好處就會越多。 /// Weapon and armor upgrades affect existing and future units, so their benefits quickly add up over the course of longer games.
LoadingScreen/Help09=建立強大經濟的關鍵就是不斷地生產太空工程車、探測機或工蟲。 /// The key to a strong economy is constantly training SCVs, Probes, or Drones.
LoadingScreen/Help10=若想達到採集最佳化，就需指派3個工作單位（太空工程車、探測機或工蟲）至每個晶礦或高能瓦斯湧源。 /// It takes 3 SCVs, Probes, or Drones to optimally harvest a Mineral Field or Vespene Geyser.
LoadingScreen/Help11=只需利用編隊功能即可訓練單位，所以沒有必要為此查看基地。 /// You can use control groups to train units without even looking at your base.
LoadingScreen/Help12=雙擊一個單位或按住 CTRL 鍵後點擊一個單位，即可選取附近與該單位類型相同的所有單位。 /// You can select all nearby units of a given type by double-clicking on a unit, or by holding CTRL and clicking on a unit.
LoadingScreen/Help13=黃色晶礦即高產量晶礦，採集此晶礦的速度會比普通晶礦來得快。 /// Rich Mineral Fields are yellow, and can be harvested faster than normal Mineral Fields.
LoadingScreen/Help14=若要在多人對戰中獲得勝利，須消滅所有敵方建築或成為遊戲中最後的僅存者。 /// To win a multiplayer game, destroy all enemy structures or be the last player still in the game.
LoadingScreen/Help15=當你在遊戲中達成目標時就會得到線上獎章，而該獎章即是你所獲得的成就。查看你的個人資訊來了解你可以獲得哪些成就。 /// Achievements are online trophies for accomplishing various goals in the game. View your profile to see what achievements you can earn.
LoadingScreen/Help16=標示為「對重甲：5」的武器可對重甲目標造成5點傷害。 /// Weapons that list damage as "vs Armored: 5" do a total of 5 damage to targets that are considered Armored.
LoadingScreen/Help17=除非有渡鴉、觀察者或監察王蟲等偵測單位進行偵測，否則無法攻擊匿蹤或遁地的單位。 /// Cloaked or burrowed units cannot be attacked unless spotted by a detector, such as a Raven, Observer, or Overseer.
LoadingScreen/Help18=像渡鴉、觀察者及監察王蟲這類偵測單位能夠發現神族的幻影分身及本體之間的差異。 /// Detectors like Ravens, Observers, and Overseers can spot the difference between Protoss Hallucinations and real units.
LoadingScreen/Help19=如果你有安裝麥克風，按住<k val="PTT"/> 即可和盟友通話。 /// If you have a microphone, you can hold down the<k val="PTT"/> key to talk to your allies.
LoadingScreen/Help20=按下<k val="CameraFollow"/> 後可使遊戲鏡頭跟著選取的單位移動。 /// Press<k val="CameraFollow"/> to have the game follow a selected unit as it moves across the battlefield.
LoadingScreen/Help21=可以使用太空工程車來修復建築或是機械單位。投入的太空工程車越多，修復的速度也就越快。 /// SCVs can be used to repair buildings or mechanical units. The more SCVs repairing, the faster the repair is complete.
LoadingScreen/Help22=在戰鬥中，可使用太空工程車來修復主要的防禦工事或戰鬥單位。 /// Use several SCVs to keep vital defenses or combat units alive during a fight.
LoadingScreen/Help23=使用醫療艇來支援大批步兵部隊。善用他們的運輸能力來將步兵送至敵軍後方以進行突襲。 /// Use Medivacs to support large infantry groups. Use their transport abilities to take infantry behind enemy lines for surprise attacks.
LoadingScreen/Help24=惡狼能以火焰發射器對一直線上的目標造成傷害。攻擊時靠近成群結隊的敵人可以使你所造成的傷害最大化。 /// Hellions do damage in a straight line with their flame thrower. Get close to packs of enemies to maximize your damage.
LoadingScreen/Help25=攻城坦克無法對距離過近的單位開火。在攻城坦克前面放置其他單位或是建築，讓坦克和敵人保持點距離。 /// Siege Tanks cannot fire at units that get too close. Put other units or structures in front of your Siege Tanks to keep the enemy back.
LoadingScreen/Help26=死神能在低崖間上下移動。運用這點對敵人進行偵察，或是對敵方工作單位發動突襲。 /// Reapers can jump up and down short cliffs. Use them to scout the enemy or make surprise attacks against their workers.
LoadingScreen/Help27=在狹窄區域放置補給站，以擋住敵人通往己方基地的行進路線。當你想要讓單位通過時，降下補給站即可。 /// Place Supply Depots in narrow areas to block enemy access to your base. Lower them when you want to leave.
LoadingScreen/Help28=使用戰鬥藥劑可以讓步兵單位在戰場上變得更加勇猛。別忘了派遣醫療艇來治療因使用戰鬥藥劑而受傷的單位。 /// Use Stimpacks to make your infantry more dangerous in battle. Use Medivacs to heal the damage done by Stimpacks.
LoadingScreen/Help29=星軌指揮總部能夠空投礦騾來採集額外資源。不要錯過任何可使用礦騾的機會。 /// Orbital Command Centers can call-down MULEs to gather additional resources. Use MULEs every chance you get.
LoadingScreen/Help30=建造更多的兵營、軍工廠及星際港，使你能夠一次生產更多部隊。 /// Building extra Barracks, Factories, and Starports enables you to train more troops at a time.
LoadingScreen/Help31=一旦開始躍傳，神族建築便會自行完成後續工作，此時探測機便可以去進行其他作業。 /// Once started, Protoss structures construct themselves, freeing up the Probe to do other things.
LoadingScreen/Help32=你可以將星核的超時空加速技能用於星核本身，即可快速地訓練探測機。 /// You can rapidly train Probes by using the Nexus' Chrono Boost ability on the Nexus itself.
LoadingScreen/Help33=空間之門可以讓你快速地躍傳單位到任何處於你能源範圍內的地點。 /// Warp Gates allow you to rapidly train units at any location where you have power.
LoadingScreen/Help34=追獵者能瞬移至視野範圍內的任何一處。善用空中單位將視野拓展至崖邊以瞬移至高處。 /// Stalkers can blink to anyplace that you can see. Use fliers to see up cliffs to gain access to high ground areas.
LoadingScreen/Help35=虛空艦專注攻擊於同一個敵方單位越久就能造成越多傷害。保護你的虛空艦，使它們能達到火力全開的階段。 /// Void Rays do more damage the longer they fight the enemy. Try to protect your Void Rays so they can get to full power.
LoadingScreen/Help36=巨像可行走於低矮的山崖間。使用這個技能來保護巨像或進行奇襲。 /// A Colossus can walk up short cliffs. Use this ability to protect your Colossus or to make surprise attacks.
LoadingScreen/Help37=哨衛能產生力場來阻礙敵人行進。善用這點來防止敵人入侵你的基地，或是用以阻擋前來侵犯的近戰單位。 /// Sentries can create Force Fields to block movement. Use them to keep enemies out of your base, or to block the approach of melee units.
LoadingScreen/Help38=哨衛能做出外貌近似己方單位的幻影分身，可以用來擾亂或迷惑敵人，讓對方分不清本體在哪。 /// Sentries can create Hallucinations that look like your units. Use them to confuse or distract the enemy from your real units.
LoadingScreen/Help39=高階聖堂武士能以幽能風暴造成大量傷害。在將他們融合成執政官之前，試著用盡他們全部的能量。 /// High Templars do a lot of damage with their Psi Storm ability. Try to use up all of their energy before merging them into Archons.
LoadingScreen/Help40=不朽者擁有特殊護盾，可將所受到的攻擊傷害降低至10點。善用不朽者來對抗像攻城坦克或雷獸等攻擊力強大的單位。 /// Immortals have a special shield that reduces attacks to 10 points of damage. Use them against powerful units like Siege Tanks or Ultralisks.
LoadingScreen/Help41=建造更多的傳送門、星際之門及機械製造廠，使你能夠一次生產更多部隊。 /// Building extra Gateways, Stargates, and Robotics Facilities enables you to train more troops at a time.
LoadingScreen/Help42=每次突變產生一個蟲族建築就會耗掉一隻工蟲。記得孵化更多工蟲來彌補，以維持收入。 /// A Drone is used up every time you make a Zerg structure. Be sure to replace those Drones to maintain your income.
LoadingScreen/Help43=選取一個孵化所，然後右鍵點擊晶礦場，即可讓之後孵化出來的工蟲自動採集晶礦。 /// Select a Hatchery and right-click on a Mineral Field to cause newly trained Drones to automatically harvest minerals.
LoadingScreen/Help44=蟲族單位在蟲苔上移動較快。盡量四處散佈蟲苔來提高部隊的速度。 /// Zerg units move more quickly on creep. Spread creep wherever you can to speed up your forces.
LoadingScreen/Help45=后蟲能讓孵化所孵化更多幼蟲。為每個孵化所都配上一隻后蟲，並且盡量多使用這項技能。 /// Queens can cause Hatcheries to spawn additional larva. Build one Queen per Hatchery and use the ability as often as possible.
LoadingScreen/Help46=蟑螂在遁地時的再生速度非常快。讓受傷的蟑螂先遁入地底，等牠們恢復生命值後再投入戰鬥之中。 /// Roaches regenerate very quickly while burrowed. Burrow your wounded Roaches so they can regenerate and then return to battle.
LoadingScreen/Help47=利用飛螳攻擊毫無防禦之力的敵方工作單位，當敵人回防的時候，飛離現場轉而攻擊其他地方。 /// Use Mutalisks to attack undefended enemy workers. When the enemy comes to defend, fly away and attack elsewhere.
LoadingScreen/Help48=如果你需要更多幼蟲來加快部隊的生產速度，可以多建一些孵化所。 /// If you need more Larvae to train troops more rapidly, build additional Hatcheries.
LoadingScreen/Help49=感染蟲和進化後的蟑螂能在遁地時移動。善用此能力以神不知鬼不覺地入侵敵方領地。 /// Infestors and upgraded Roaches can move while burrowed. Use this ability to infiltrate enemy territory unobserved.
LoadingScreen/Help50=感染蟲可以使用神經寄生來控制敵方單位。善用此技能在攻城坦克和巨像這種危險的敵人身上。 /// Infestors can use Neural Parasite to control enemy units. Use this on dangerous enemies like Siege Tanks and Colossi.
LoadingScreen/Help51=你可以開啟顯示建造網格選項來了解如何利用建築物來阻斷地面單位的移動路徑。你可以在選項內的遊戲內容找到此功能。 /// You can turn on the 'Display Build Grid' option to understand how to use buildings to block ground movement.  You can find it in the Options menu's Gameplay tab.
LoadingScreen/Help52=你在劇情戰役中玩的種族有其專屬的設定。多人對戰跟劇情戰役中的單位與建築有許多不同的地方。 /// The races you play in campaign are heavily modified.  Your units and structures in multiplayer are very different than what you have played in campaign.
LoadingScreen/Help53=你可以觀看你的戰鬥錄影來研究如何增進自己的實力。 /// You can watch replays of your games to learn how to better play the game.
LoadingScreen/Help54=你可以和A.I.練習對戰來改進自己的戰術。 /// You can practice against the A.I. to improve your strategies.
LoadingScreen/Help55=試著預測對手的下一步以破解他們的攻擊或防禦戰術。 /// Try to anticipate what your opponent's next move will be so you can counter their next attack or defense.
LoadingScreen/Help56=盡你所能採集最多的資源並且將其全數花光。部隊數量多的一方通常能獲得勝利。 /// Gather as many resources as you can and spend them all. The larger army almost always wins.
LoadingScreen/Help57=《星海爭霸II》有許多職業級的玩家。你可以看他們的比賽來學習新的戰術。 /// StarCraft II is played by professional gamers. Watch pro matches to learn new strategies.
LoadingScreen/Help58=《星海爭霸II》可以免費遊玩了！邀請你的朋友到StarCraft2.com下載遊戲！ /// StarCraft II is free to play! Invite your friends to download the game at StarCraft2.com!
LoadingScreen/Help59=別忘了，你可以在「星海大師」遊樂場遊戲的30個挑戰中測試你的微控實力！ /// Don’t forget that you can put your micro to the test in 30 interesting challenges in the StarCraft Master Arcade game!
