Skin/Info/Adept=教士是訓練有素的戰場指揮官，使用淨化者科技來強化自身的幽能。他們可以投射出自身的幽影，並藉此傳送一大段距離。 /// Highly trained battlefield commanders, adepts utilize Purifier technology to amplify their psionic potential. They are capable of projecting shades of themselves and teleporting across great distances.
Skin/Info/AdeptCE=達蘭的星穹冶煉廠或許能重建葛拉西斯的淨化者兵器，不過成品的性能跟原本由凱拉克所設計的原型機相比，還有一段距離。 /// The Daelaam's starforges may be capable of reconstructing the Purifier ordnance from Glacius, but they have yet to match the optimal performance of Karax's original prototypes.
Skin/Info/AdeptGolden=末日之戰之後，緬懷往日時光的風潮逐漸興起。某些教士開始穿著過去的正式禮儀護甲，來展現他們的榮耀。 /// Nostalgic sentiment has been growing among the templar after the End War. Some adepts show their pride by wearing formal ceremonial armor from bygone days. 
Skin/Info/AdeptIhanrii=就算是老練的伊翰利教士，在求救訊號傳到克普魯星區邊疆地帶，將他們從靜滯狀態喚醒之後，也需要一段時間才能搞清楚狀況。 /// Even battle-hardened Ihan-rii adepts needed time to get their bearings after a distress signal woke them from deep stasis on the fringes of the Koprulu Sector.
Skin/Info/AdeptPurifier=經過相位工匠凱拉克精密調整後，這些搭配人工智慧的戰士成為淨化者部隊的中堅份子，它們展現出來的敏捷身手和調整的精密程度令人讚嘆。 /// Refined by Phase-smith Karax, these AI warriors have become central figures in Purifier armies, impressing all who see them with their agility and refinement.
Skin/Info/AdeptTaldarim=雖然時間還不長，不過塔達力姆運用逆向解析來研究達蘭教士身上的幽能強化科技，並且配備在這群前途無量的戰士身上。 /// Despite its recent development, the psionic amplification technology used by the Daelaam's adepts has already been reverse engineered by the Tal'darim and equipped on their most promising warriors.
Skin/Info/Archon=雖然執政官的幽能非常強大，但是必須付出不小的代價：必須犧牲兩名聖堂武士，才能形成一名執政官。因此，每一名執政官都體現出無與倫比的英雄氣概。
Skin/Info/Armory=兵工廠在建造時就附有數座風機，可以維持建築物在一定的溫度範圍內，讓其中的研究人員可以不斷努力改進人類的戰爭機器。 /// The armory is built around several turbines. These keep the building within temperature specifications while researchers work tirelessly to improve terran war machinery.
Skin/Info/ArmoryCovertOps=自治聯盟在新型鋼鐵裝甲上的最新進展，是透過對特種部隊取回的薩爾納加石像進行分子層次研究而成的。 /// The Dominion's latest advances in neosteel armor were developed through the molecular examination of xel'naga constructs recovered by special forces teams.
Skin/Info/ArmorySilver=神族在泰拉朵九號星兵工廠附近徘徊的報導，引發出一連串間諜活動的指控。伊翰利領導階層堅持這只是當地居民將發光建築誤認為人類博物館的意外事件。 /// Reports of protoss wandering into Tyrador IX's armories led to accusations of espionage, though Ihan-rii leadership insisted that these incidents were the result of settlers mistaking the gleaming structures for terran museums.
Skin/Info/Assimilator=即使是科技最先進的神族，也需要這種多用途的高能瓦斯。他們開發出了瓦斯處理廠來收集這種實用的資源。 /// Even the highly advanced protoss appreciate the myriad applications of vespene gas. They developed assimilators to harvest this useful resource.
Skin/Info/AssimilatorForged=塔達利姆瓦斯處理廠從土地中貪婪地搾取高能瓦斯，強度甚至引發了地震，破壞周圍的生態系統。 /// Tal'darim assimilators greedily wrench vespene gas from the ground, triggering earthquakes that decimate surrounding ecosystems.
Skin/Info/AssimilatorIhanrii=伊翰利神族認為自己相當大方，因為他們長久以來允許人類住在阿拉基爾，並且在當地開採高能瓦斯，這顆星球可是他們的古老聖地。 /// The Ihan-rii protoss consider themselves very generous for allowing terrans to continue living on, let alone mining vespene gas from, their ancient and sacred homeworld, which they call Arakyr.
Skin/Info/AssimilatorTaldarim=
Skin/Info/Baneling=毒爆蟲首次登場是在卡斯克攻城戰，這是一種不穩定而且容易爆炸的戰鬥品系，由異化蟲進化而成。沒有多少物質能抵抗牠們爆炸時噴發出來的強酸。 /// First observed during the Siege of Cask, the baneling is a highly volatile and explosive combat strain evolved from the zergling. Few materials can resist the acidic burst released upon their detonation.
Skin/Info/BanelingMecha=工程師重新打造毒爆蟲時，遭遇到了一個獨特的問題，就是他們小心採來的酸液囊，總是會腐蝕穿過周圍的金屬板結構。不過工程師們最終還是解決了這個問題。 /// The recreation of the baneling posed a unique problem for engineers, as their carefully harvested acid sacs kept melting through the surrounding plate infrastructure. Eventually, they made it work.
Skin/Info/BanelingNest=蟲族的蟲巢裡一定要有一個毒爆蟲巢，來提供毒爆蟲品系的基因編碼。一旦毒爆蟲巢就緒，就可以命令任何在戰場上的異化蟲短暫進入蟲蛹狀態，然後再孵化為毒爆蟲。這是一種惡臭、腫脹的生物，背上還有充滿酸液的綠色囊腫。 /// The zerg hive cluster must have a baneling nest to add the baneling breed's genetic code. Once a nest is in place, any zergling on the field can be commanded to form a fleshy chrysalis for a brief pupation state, and then it will burst forth as a baneling--a foul, bloated creature with bulbous, acid-filled green sacs pulsating on its back.
Skin/Info/BanelingNestMecha=擬態機甲毒爆蟲巢的上半部運用了與人類戰巡艦相同的反重力科技，使其漂浮在空中。 /// The upper half of the Simulant baneling nest is held aloft by the same antigravity technology deployed in terran battlecruisers.
Skin/Info/BanelingNestRCZ=地獄犬為了摧毀人類的重要防禦設施而改造了毒爆蟲巢，使其能夠在泰拉朵九號星的洞穴通道網路中引爆。 /// To trigger the collapse of key terran fortifications, Cerberus baneling nests have been rigged to detonate in cave networks across Tyrador IX.
Skin/Info/BanelingPrimal=德哈卡從凱莉根蟲群的毒爆蟲獲得啟發，決定在他自己的原生族群裡面挑出相似的品系進行突變。 /// Inspired by the banelings in Kerrigan's Swarm, Dehaka has encouraged the mutation of a similar strain of creatures within his pack.
Skin/Info/BanelingRCZ=為了讓毒爆蟲馬上引爆，投入大筆資金替換神經系統所獲得的效益相當讓人懷疑。但幸好地獄犬的客戶們手頭上都有大筆資金。 /// The return on investment for replacing a baneling's entire nervous system, only to have it immediately blow up, is dubious. Luckily, Cerberus's clients have quite a lot of money to spend.
Skin/Info/BanelingWebby=利維坦群落所演化出的毒爆蟲，牠們的酸液囊仍然保留了異化蟲身上的脊狀物。即使整個形態完全改變，仍無損牠們胡作非為的本性。 /// The spine-like growths of Leviathan Brood zerglings remain present on the acid sacs of their banelings. Even a total metamorphosis is incapable of changing the chaotic nature of their core essence.
Skin/Info/Banshee=恆星工業組織所設計的女妖轟炸機，兼具了成本和效率兩個優點。這種轟炸機的主要功能是為前線步兵單位提供空中支援，是非常理想的戰術攻擊空中單位。 /// Procyon Industries designed banshees to be both economical and effective. Built specifically to provide air support for frontline infantry, they are ideal aircraft for tactical strikes.
Skin/Info/BansheeCovertOps=自治聯盟的工程師在女妖轟炸機的垂直升降渦輪風扇方面有重大突破，在機體後方加裝垂直穩定器之後，大幅提升了穩定度和整體效能。 /// Dominion engineers have made critical upgrades in the banshee's twin VTOL turbofans, enabling superior stability and performance when paired with the new vertical stabilizer in the rear of the craft.
Skin/Info/BansheeJunker=把一堆零件加裝在機械上面，已經成為傭兵惡名昭彰的特色；他們的女妖轟炸機當然也不例外。據說，這個特殊的設計還用上了一些推土機零件。 /// Mercenaries are infamous for cobbling together pieces of equipment on their machinery, and these banshees are no exception. Rumor has it that some bulldozer parts are involved in this particular design.
Skin/Info/BansheeSilver=儘管大多數的泰拉朵女妖轟炸機都在第一波的地獄犬蟲族攻勢中被殲滅了，但還是有一位老練的飛行員解決了三頭雷獸。 /// Though most Tyrador banshees were wiped out in the first wave of the Cerberus zerg attack, one seasoned pilot managed to take down three ultralisks first. 
Skin/Info/BansheeUmojan=在數次地下交易之後，尤摩捷護衛軍總算可以從恆星工業組織取得幾台女妖轟炸機，而工業組織方面則宣稱他們被偷了。 /// Through a series of backdoor deals, the Umojan Protectorate has been able to acquire a limited number of banshees from Procyon Industries, although the company maintains that they were stolen.
Skin/Info/Barracks=人類步兵遠離家園時的棲身之處，兵營不但清潔，具機動性，而且相當容易部署。 /// A home-away-from-home for terran infantry personnel, terran barracks are sterile, mobile, and capable of efficient deployment.
Skin/Info/BarracksCovertOps=液態氮冷卻系統讓特種部隊的兵營閃耀著怪異的藍色光輝。 /// A liquid nitrogen cooling system gives the special forces barracks an eerie blue glow. 
Skin/Info/BarracksSilver=每一座泰拉朵騎士的兵營都配有五星級自動化廚房，以及全面性的健康休閒服務，不過僅供軍官階層使用。 /// Each Knights of Tyrador barracks features a five-star robotic kitchen and a full-service spa--for officers only, of course.
Skin/Info/Battlecruiser=在戰線拉長的時候，常常會以戰巡艦當作行動指揮總部，可說是兼具厚實防禦和強力武器的空中要塞。 /// Battlecruisers often serve as mobile command headquarters during extended military campaigns. They are flying fortresses outfitted with heavy armor and imposing weaponry.
Skin/Info/BattlecruiserCovertOps=經歷長時間的研發與改良，全新升級的命運女神級戰巡艦，終於獲准編入自治聯盟特種部隊的專屬單位。 /// After a lengthy research and development process, the newly upgraded Moirai class battlecruisers were approved for exclusive use by Dominion Special Forces.
Skin/Info/BattlecruiserJunker=這批威力強大的艦隊，被改裝成符合傭兵品味的船艦。不過，看到這些船艦的人通常很快就死了，沒幾個能活著讚嘆他們優秀的船艦改裝技術。 /// These ferocious vessels have been modified to suit the mercenaries' preferences. However, few onlookers live long enough to admire their handiwork.
Skin/Info/BattlecruiserRemastered=群落戰爭時期的戰巡艦艦橋外型比較低調，並且可以直接觀察左右舷的狀況，以確保能監控到蟲族入侵的狀況。 /// The command decks of Brood War-era battlecruisers had a lower profile, with port and starboard viewdecks to ensure maximum visibility in the event of a zerg ambush.
Skin/Info/BattlecruiserSilver=在地獄犬蟲族的進攻之下，泰拉朵騎士們派出了巨獸級戰巡艦，向星軌上等待著的石製戰艦求援。 /// Assailed by Cerberus zerg, the Knights of Tyrador dispatched a Behemoth-class battlecruiser to request aid from the stone ships waiting in silent orbit.
Skin/Info/BattlecruiserUmojan=尤摩捷戰巡艦擁有重新設計的新型鋼鐵合金板，以及針對大和砲的調整，讓它們在戰鬥中特別顯眼。 /// Umojan battlecruisers feature redesigned neosteel plating, as well as refinements to the Yamato cannons that make them particularly distinctive in battles.
Skin/Info/BroodLord=經由進化成為天空霸主的寄生王蟲，會射出寄生蟲來攻擊敵人。對敵人來說，牠是相當恐怖的生物。 /// Evolved to rule the skies, the brood lords are terrifying creatures that hurl their destructive broodlings at enemy forces.
Skin/Info/BroodLordMecha=就在超越所有標準的寄生王蟲原型機即將完成時，擬態計畫的科學家都去度假慶祝了。但奇怪的是，再也沒有人回來工作了… /// Upon completing the brood lord prototype which exceeded all standards, the team of Project Simulant scientists were sent on leave for a celebratory vacation. Strangely, they never returned...
Skin/Info/BroodLordPrimal=有少數寄生王蟲被整合到原生蟲族族群當中，導致這些與眾不同的生物有著不尋常的爪子。 /// A small number of brood lords have been integrated into primal zerg packs, resulting in a strikingly different creature most notable for its unusual claws.
Skin/Info/BroodLordRCZ=地獄犬寄生王蟲所派出的寄生蟲，都可以由指揮官透過電腦介面，在遠端對個別單位下指令進行戰鬥。 /// Each broodling dispatched from the Cerberus brood lord can be controlled individually by a commander safe at a computer console, far away from the actual battle.
Skin/Info/BroodLordWebby=雖然寄生王蟲在後期才加入蟲族行列，不過牠們身上大多仍保留了利維坦群落的明顯基因特徵，就像是進化管理者阿巴瑟在初期原質實驗所留下的記號一樣。 /// Despite their late introduction into the Swarm, many brood lords still bear the Leviathan Brood's signature genetic traits--likely a sign of early essence experimentation by the evolution master, Abathur.
Skin/Info/BroodLord_PremiumSkin_Aquatic=在感染某顆星球上絕大多數的海洋之後，部分寄生王蟲透過進化，獲得棲息在水中的能力，能夠潛入深邃的海溝，吞噬牠們的獵物。 /// While infesting a planet with exceptionally large seas, some brood lords took to the water and evolved the ability to dive deep into the trenches while devouring their prey.
Skin/Info/Bunker=因為碉堡無所不在而且內部缺乏設施，人類步兵通常稱它為「戰場棺材」。 /// Due to its ubiquity and lack of amenities, terran infantry commonly refer to bunkers as "battlefield coffins."
Skin/Info/BunkerCovertOps=下個世代的自治聯盟碉堡可以完整承受一隻雷獸的重量，不過讓陸戰隊們更開心的是裡面終於有椅子了。 /// The next-generation Dominion bunker can withstand the full weight of an ultralisk, but what most marines are excited about is the fact that it comes with chairs.
Skin/Info/BunkerSilver=泰拉朵的超降溫碉堡，就算在悶熱的熱帶度假區，也一樣能營造出舒適的偵察環境。 /// Tyrador's supercooled bunkers make for comfortable reconnaissance, even in sweltering tropical vacation zones.
Skin/Info/Carrier=這些宏偉的主力艦，能夠鼓舞聖堂武士...或是讓敵人心生畏懼。艦上搭載的攔截機，是戰場上令人聞風喪膽的武力。 /// These magnificent capital ships are known to inspire hope in the hearts of the templar--or fear in their enemies. Armed with swift interceptors, they are a formidable force on the battlefield.
Skin/Info/CarrierGolden=有一小部分的航空母艦使用了古代的技術重新打造，讓外觀看起來更像來自衝突紀元以後的機種。這些航空母艦主要做為外交用途。 /// A small number of carriers have been rebuilt using ancient techniques to better resemble their counterparts from the period after the Aeon of Strife. They are primarily used for diplomatic visits.
Skin/Info/CarrierIhanrii=伊翰利神族開發出了這種可動石質材料，不只輕量、耐用，還不易起化學反應。這些特性讓它相當適合當作大型太空船艦的材料。 /// The animated stone developed by the Ihan-rii protoss is light, durable, and chemically inert, making it the perfect material for massive deep-space ships.
Skin/Info/CarrierPurifier=淨化者的航空母艦是極具效率的船艦，將自動化技術與極為致命的無人兵器完美結合在一起。 /// The Purifier carrier is a streamlined creation that perfectly combines automation expertise with the deadliest of drone weapons.
Skin/Info/CarrierRemastered=航空母艦的主體是以星梭號這艘傳說中的旗艦為範本，並在特定角落保留了神族的空間，來紀念塔薩達和他的犧牲奉獻。 /// Carriers modeled after legendary flagship Gantrithor continue to be built in certain corners of Protoss space, to honor Tassadar and the sacrifice he made.
Skin/Info/CarrierTaldarim=塔達力姆船艦的特徵，就是把卡萊工程技術轉化為殺傷力。整支死亡艦隊的主力幾乎由航空母艦構成。 /// Tal'darim shipwrights excel at repurposing khalai engineering for bloodshed. The carriers that make up the majority of the death fleet are warships through and through.
Skin/Info/Carrier_AmonBrood_Collection=亞蒙腐化了大部分的黃金艦隊，納為己用。虛空能量不只改變了這些受控神族的外表，就連船艦外觀也因而改變。 /// Amon corrupted a large portion of the Golden Armada, using their warriors as his own. These possessed protoss took on a different appearance due to the Void energy, and their ships were likewise changed.
Skin/Info/Colossus=巨像是神族首見專為破壞而設計的機器人。它們不僅象徵著血腥的過去，也代表著鞏固未來和平的必要手段。 /// Colossi were the first protoss robots designed solely for destruction. They are both a symbol of a bloody history and a necessary weapon to secure a peaceful future.
Skin/Info/ColossusCE=在凱拉什仲裁事件後，淨化者計畫中的巨像因過於危險而遭禁用。而如今巨像已成為聖堂武士中的傳奇，是終極的淨化機器。 /// Deemed too dangerous for use after the Kalath Intercession, the Purifier program's colossi are legendary among the Templar's warriors. These are the ultimate purification machines.
Skin/Info/ColossusGolden=以傳統風格使用最好的材料，重新打造在末日之戰中的巨像。這些巨像現在和古老的神族機械一樣富麗堂皇。 /// Selected colossi that saw combat in the End War have been remodeled in a traditionalist style using the finest materials available. They now resemble the grandest of ancient protoss robotics.
Skin/Info/ColossusIhanrii=伊翰利巨像大多數的石質元件，都是經由重新設計的薩爾納加產能器所產生的虛空能量，來結合並保持懸浮狀態。 /// The many stone components of the Ihan-rii colossus are levitated and held together by void energies emanated from repurposed xel'naga dynamos.
Skin/Info/ColossusPurifier=靠著最新的工程技術，淨化者打造出了流線且優雅的巨像，不過它依舊是一台不折不扣的殘暴戰爭機器。 /// The latest in Purifier engineering has yielded a sleek, subtly enhanced colossus that is nonetheless a brutal war machine.
Skin/Info/ColossusTal=巨像是遠古戰爭的產物，原本被埋藏在星區各處，如今塔達力姆飛升者將它們挖掘出來，要利用它們強大的火力。 /// Relics of wars long over, colossi that lay buried and forgotten across the sector are often unearthed and reactivated by Tal'darim ascendants who seek superior firepower.
Skin/Info/ColossusTaldarim=位階較低的飛升者經常相互挑釁對方，看看誰能將一台啟動的巨像癱瘓，然後取得控制權，如果成功了，塔達力姆就增添一台強大的戰爭兵器。如果失敗了也沒差，就少一位飛升者當你的競爭對手啦。 /// Lower ranking ascendants often dare each other to disable and commandeer an active colossus. If one succeeds, the Tal'darim gain a powerful war machine. If not, a rival ascendant has been eliminated.
Skin/Info/CommandCenter=指揮中心具備高機動性和實務機能，可以進行資源調度。它可以隨時移動到富有晶礦和高能瓦斯的地方。 /// Mobile and practical, command centers are resource processors that can relocate to wherever minerals or vespene gas are plentiful.
Skin/Info/CommandCenterCovertOps=強化反作用力登陸爪讓這座指揮中心可以在最艱困的環境中穩定著地。 /// Reinforced repulsor landing claws help this command center find solid footing in even the harshest environments.
Skin/Info/CommandCenterRemastered=早先的指揮中心在設計上具備擴充式介面，用以連結外部附屬建築。後來為了提高安全性，以內建的隔區取代這些介面。 /// Previous iterations of the command center had an extensible interface in order to connect with external add-ons. These were later replaced with internal bays for increased security.
Skin/Info/CommandCenterSilver=泰拉朵指揮中心在伊翰利神族到來之後，是用來接待克普魯星區眾多外交使節的地方，每名使節都極力想招募新來者加入他們的特定政治議程。 /// After the arrival of the Ihan-rii protoss, Tyrador's command centers played host to diplomatic envoys from around the Koprulu Sector, each intent on recruiting the newcomers to their own specific political agenda.
Skin/Info/Corruptor=腐化飛蟲是藉由生物產生的電磁場浮在空中，牠噴出的強酸連最堅固的建材都能腐蝕掉。 /// Held aloft by a biologically produced electromagnetic field, corruptors can spray a stream of caustic acid that eats through even the most durable of construction materials.
Skin/Info/CorruptorMecha=這些機械腐化飛蟲沒有孢子，而是用自我複製的奈米機器人取代，並且以程式執行相同的功能。這實在是讓人很不放心。 /// Rather than spores, these mechanical corruptors possess self-replicating nanites that have been programmed to perform the same function, disturbingly enough.
Skin/Info/CorruptorPrimal=腐化飛蟲演化方式在蟲群與原生蟲族中截然不同，後者有著更加厚重的爪子和蟲殼，為牠們嚴苛的攝食方式提供協助。 /// The original corruptors have the distinction of being adapted by both the Swarm and the primal zerg. The latter have adapted thicker claws and carapaces to assist with their rigorous feeding process.
Skin/Info/CorruptorRCZ=在阿克圖洛斯‧蒙斯克死亡之後，地獄犬計畫轉向地下進行，並把神經重組的目標由人類士兵轉往蟲族。 /// Driven underground after the fall of Arcturus Mengsk, the Cerberus Program evolved their neural reprogramming initiative, targeting zerg instead of terran soldiers.
Skin/Info/CorruptorWebby=雖然硬化脊刺和網狀組織常常讓人聯想到水棲生物，不過利維坦群落的腐化飛蟲卻能夠在強大的重力環境下生存。 /// While hardened spines and webbed features often suggest an aquatic background, the Leviathan Brood's corruptors adapted them to survive in high gravity environments.
Skin/Info/CreepTumorMecha=流浪的擬態機甲后蟲所產生的蟲苔瘤裡，必定包含著精密的奈米科技。但因為蟲苔瘤切開後隨即引爆的特性，導致後續研究難以進行。
Skin/Info/CyberneticsCore=眾所皆知，神族會把死亡的精英戰士配對並結合在後天打造的身軀上，讓他們獲得新生，繼續光榮戰鬥。機械控制核心在開發這項技術時扮演了重要的角色。 /// The protoss are known to pair elite fallen warriors with artificial bodies, granting them a second life in glorious combat. The cybernetics core plays a large role in developing this technology.
Skin/Info/CyberneticsCoreForged=所有的機械控制核心都是為了把生物個體與複雜的機械結合，塔達利姆機械核心唯一的不同之處在於結合的過程痛苦到難以想像。 /// All cybernetics cores possess the ability to bind biological beings to elaborate machinery; in Tal'darim cybernetics cores, the main difference is that the process is unimaginably painful.
Skin/Info/CyberneticsCoreIhanrii=雖然伊翰利機械控制核心和同時期的神族版本所產生的能量差異很大，不過還是可以從伊翰利殖民地的人類偵查設備看出其中的相似性。 /// Terran recon of Ihan-rii settlements yielded footage of a structure resembling the contemporary protoss cybernetics core, though the energies produced by the Ihan-rii version were wildly different.
Skin/Info/Cyclone=颶風飛彈車原先是設計成全自動無人機動攻擊載具，後來經過重新設計，可乘載一名駕駛員。畢竟，人類駕駛員的不可預測性是獨一無二的。 /// Originally intended to be fully automated, this mobile assault vehicle was redesigned to accommodate a pilot. After all, nothing can match the unpredictability of a human driver.
Skin/Info/CycloneCovertOps=這台載具經過大幅度重新設計，好提升執行特種部隊任務所需要的機動性，例如裸露在外的胎面能適應各種難以移動的地形，以及輕易在狹小空間移動。 /// This vehicle has undergone extensive redesigns to increase its maneuverability in special forces missions, including exposed treads that will cross difficult terran and small spaces more readily.
Skin/Info/CycloneJunker=米拉的傭兵大幅改裝了颶風飛彈車，裝上了合金版和大量尖刺。但因為他們施工草率，吸收傷害的能力其實根本沒差。 /// Mira's mercs have significantly bulked up their cyclones, adding extra plating and a generous number of spikes. However, due to their hasty engineering, its ability to absorb damage remains the same.
Skin/Info/CycloneSilver=當地獄犬蟲族攻擊泰拉朵九號星時，有幾台颶風飛彈車還只裝備了本來要在晚上施放的遊樂園煙火。 /// When the Cerberus zerg attacked Tyrador IX, a few cyclones sent to defend were still armed with harmless fireworks used for nightly amusement park displays.
Skin/Info/CycloneUmojan=如果模仿是最真摯的奉承，那這些颶風飛彈車就是尤摩捷工程師對泰倫自治聯盟工藝技術的致敬。 /// If imitation is the sincerest form of flattery, then these cyclones are the Umojan engineers' elaborate tribute to the ingenuity of the Terran Dominion.
Skin/Info/DarkShrine=黑暗聖殿原先是尼拉辛姆這個獨立神族社群的紀念碑。在重新加入卡萊之後，尼拉辛姆將它做為訓練黑暗聖堂武士的基地。 /// The dark shrine once stood as a monument to the independent society of the Nerazim. After the rejoining the khalai, the Nerazim repurposed it as a training ground for dark templar.
Skin/Info/DarkShrineForged=只有血獵人，大領主邪惡意志的執行者，知道塔達利姆黑暗聖殿裡流動的是什麼東西。 /// None but the blood hunters, enforcers of the Highlords' malevolent will, know what transpires within the Tal'darim dark shrine.
Skin/Info/DarkShrineIhanrii=即使根據人類的觀測，顯示伊翰利黑暗聖殿外部那些可動石質材料的溫度幾乎低到結凍的程度，可是從聖殿頂部放出的高溫熱氣，不難得知內部溫度其實異常地高。 /// The superheated fumes venting from the top of the Ihan-rii dark shrine suggest infernal internal temperatures, though terran thermal analysis indicates the animated stone exterior is near-freezing.
Skin/Info/DarkTemplar=黑暗聖堂武士是尼拉辛姆的強悍幽能戰士，他們能夠控制虛空的力量，從暗影處發動致命兇猛的攻擊。 /// Powerful psionic warriors of the Nerazim, dark templar have learned how to manipulate the powers of the Void. They strike from the shadows, deadly and relentless.
Skin/Info/DarkTemplarGolden=守舊派的聖堂武士宣稱已經和一些尼拉辛姆締結了友誼，並且誇耀這些人是達蘭的真正象徵。但其他傳言說他們只是被賄絡了。 /// Templar traditionalists claim to have befriended a few of the Nerazim, boasting that these individuals are the true symbol of the Daelaam. Others say they were merely bribed.
Skin/Info/DarkTemplarIhanrii=伊翰利神族在訓練初期，相當依賴虛空水晶來與他們獨特的幽能特徵共振。但當他們成熟以後，就會把這顆幽能水晶打造成致命又鋒利的矛尖。 /// Early in their training, Ihan-rii protoss are bound to a void crystal that resonates with their unique psionic signature. Once they reach adulthood, this crystal is sharpened into a deadly spearpoint.
Skin/Info/DarkTemplarPurifier=淨化者和尼拉辛姆在交流增加之後，設計出了新款的哨兵，模擬了黑暗聖堂武士在戰鬥中無畏的態度。 /// After increased interaction with the Nerazim, the Purifiers have designed a new variant on the sentinel that mimics the combat prowess of Dark Templar warriors.
Skin/Info/DarkTemplarTaldarim=塔達力姆這支部族是相當殘酷的，而且心狠手辣。無情的血獵人會藏身暗處，獵殺那些無法侍奉大領主的弱者。 /// Tal'darim society is brutal and unforgiving. Those deemed too weak to be of service to their Highlord are ruthlessly hunted down and executed by the blood hunters, who stalk their prey unseen.
Skin/Info/Disruptor=裂光球是神族武力中最具破壞力的單位，源自淨化者計畫中的其中一項研究。它們的武器具有恆星能量的威力，破壞力十足。 /// Originally developed as part of the Purifier program, disruptors are among the deadliest of protoss armaments. Their solarite arsenal is capable of immense devastation.
Skin/Info/DisruptorGolden=和巨像一樣，經歷過末日之戰的裂光球也被翻新，做為紀念神族勝利的象徵。而失敗的部分，或許會隨著時間過去而消逝。 /// Much like the colossi, disruptors that saw combat in the End War have been refurbished as reminders of the protoss' moments of victory. Perhaps with time, the memories of their losses will fade.
Skin/Info/DisruptorIhanrii=從主力艦水晶核心發射出的伊翰利裂光球，外觀閃耀著綠色的能量。任何生物接觸到它的中央能量時，都會馬上灰飛煙滅。 /// Ihan-rii disruptors draw crackling green energy directly from the crystal cores of their capital ships. Anything biological that makes contact with the central power conduit is promptly vaporized.
Skin/Info/DisruptorPurifier=來自賽博洛斯的最新裂光球擁有先進的裝甲，而且在協定上做了精密的調整。這些改進表示他們投入了大量心力在研發工作上。 /// The latest disruptors from Cybros feature advanced plating and protocol refinements that reflect their investment in ongoing research.
Skin/Info/DisruptorTaldarim=雖然塔達力姆總是對達蘭所配備的武器不停的冷嘲熱諷，不過當他們還是會盡全力奪取裂光球並且加以改造，越多越好。畢竟，像這種威力強大的武器，誰不喜歡呢。 /// The Tal'darim often scoff at the Daelaam's choice of weaponry, but they were quick to seize and repurpose as many disruptors as they could. Such destructive power is too great to ignore.
Skin/Info/Drone=工蟲除了專心工作以外，不會去思考其他事情，體內具有可進化成任何蟲族建築的基因編碼。只需要提供牠們資源，以及為額外生物質提供養分的蟲苔就行了。 /// Single-minded and diligent, drones hold within their genetic code the evolutionary potential of all zerg structures. All they require are resources and creep to nourish their added biomass.
Skin/Info/DroneBlizzcon17=這隻不尋常的工蟲，是在一堆生鏽的殘骸中孵化出來。 為了不受影響，牠轉化自己的身體，與瓦礫融合。 /// This unusual drone hatched amid a pile of rusting terran wreckage. Rather than suffering from the interference, its flesh adapted to fuse itself to the rubble.
Skin/Info/DroneMecha=擬態計畫一開始是從打造機械工蟲開始，原本的用途是當作練習目標，來測試各類戰鬥技巧和武器，但這計畫很快就開始擴大，規模也遠比原本要大得多。 /// The Simulant Project began with the construction of a mechanical drone that could be used during target practice to test alternate combat techniques and weapons, but it soon grew much larger.
Skin/Info/DronePrimal=原生工蟲經常發現牠們處於危險的狀況下，因為族群中較強的個體會將工蟲當作額外的營養來源。 /// Primal drones often find themselves in a perilous position, as stronger members of their packs have been known to feed on them when they require additional nourishment.
Skin/Info/DroneRCZ=就像其他地獄犬蟲族一樣，工蟲的神經系統也被機械控制系統取代，它可以完整控制蟲族的骨骼和肌肉。 /// Like the rest of the Cerberus zerg, this drone's nervous system has been replaced with cybernetic technology, enabling full musculoskeletal control.
Skin/Info/DroneRemastered=工蟲的早期演化歷程中，曾經擁有更多樣的色彩，和更加具侵略性的反射行為。但隨著時間過去，這些特徵最終消失在蟲群當中。 /// Earlier evolutions of the drone had more vibrant coloration and increased aggression reflexes that gradually disappeared within the population in the following years.
Skin/Info/DroneWebby=帶有劇毒的鰭刺，是警告捕食者不要靠近的常見防禦機制。有些生物會模仿這種外觀，藉此降低受到侵略的可能性。 /// Poisonous fin rays are a universal defense mechanism signaling predators to stay away. Some creatures merely mimic their deadly appearance to discourage unwanted aggression.
Skin/Info/EngineeringBay=人類在群落戰爭之後開始大幅度發展工程能力。而因為人員的增加和工作複雜度的提升，電機工程所不再具備飛行能力。 /// The terrans heavily developed their engineering capabilities after the Brood War. Due to the increase in personnel and the intricacy of their work, the engineering bay is no longer cleared for flight.
Skin/Info/EngineeringBayCovertOps=實驗型電機工程所透過讓人工智慧在模擬戰爭中互相競爭的方式，加快研究速度。 /// Experimental engineering bays increase research speed by pitting rival AIs against one another in simulated battle.
Skin/Info/EngineeringBaySilver=每座泰拉朵電機工程所，都有一個區塊打算用來當成新型遊樂園景點，不過在地獄犬蟲族來襲之後，這件事情就暫時擱置了。 /// A portion of each Knights of Tyrador engineering bay is devoted to concocting new amusement park attractions, though this policy has been temporarily suspended in wake of the Cerberus zerg assault.
Skin/Info/EvolutionChamber=在進化室裡，基因序列會扭曲並融合，讓蟲族大軍獲得強化。 /// Genetic sequences twist and merge within the evolution chamber, generating improvements to the zerg army. 
Skin/Info/EvolutionChamberMecha=就像其他的擬態機甲建築，進化室也是由可彎曲的聚合物合金組成，如此才能應付內部不斷攪動的生物機械程序。 /// Like other Simulant structures, the evolution chamber is constructed from a polymeric alloy capable of flexing to accommodate the roiling biomechanical processes within.
Skin/Info/EvolutionChamberRCZ=地獄犬生物工程部門在歷經長達數月的挫敗後，發現只要在進化室的數條動脈裡面注入滿滿的命令激素，就能控制這座建築的超適應傾向。 /// After months of frustration in the Cerberus bioengineering department, it was discovered that pumping an evolution chamber's arteries full of command pheromones could just about tame the structure's hyperadaptive tendencies.
Skin/Info/Extractor=這座生物性的建築物會吸收高能瓦斯並將其以肉囊的形式排出。這些肉囊經過精心設計，讓工蟲可以輕鬆搬運。 /// This is a biological structure that digests vespene gas before excreting it in small flesh sacs. These sacs are perfectly designed to be easily transportable by a drone.
Skin/Info/ExtractorMecha=在擬態機甲的計畫檔案中，載明了瓦斯萃取巢只有裝飾性的用途。至於它如何改變為擁有完整瓦斯生產功能的建築，沒有人知道其中的原因。 /// Planning documents indicate that the Simulant Project's extractors were intended to be purely decorative. It remains unclear when they shifted into full vespene production.
Skin/Info/ExtractorRCZ=地獄犬瓦斯萃取巢在泰拉朵九號星的地表下跳動，汲取地殼中每一道高能瓦斯，化為進一步擴張的能量。 /// Cerberus extractors pulse unremittingly beneath Tyrador IX's surface, leeching every trace of vespene gas from the planet's crust to power further expansion.
Skin/Info/Factory=在第二次星際戰爭期間，軍工廠拆除了廁所，讓技師可以利用多出來的空間部署具備攻城功能的攻城坦克。 /// During the Second Great War, latrines were removed from factories. This extra space allowed mechanics to deploy siege tanks with siege capabilities already installed.
Skin/Info/FactoryCovertOps=R36系列軍工廠有更堅固的錨爪、強化的地基，表面還加上了防彈塗層。 /// The R36-series factory features sturdier anchors, a reinforced foundation, and bulletproof coat of paint.
Skin/Info/FactorySilver=伊翰利神族和泰拉朵九號星領導階層之間的協商遇到強烈阻礙，原因是位於爭議區域的人類軍工廠發生數起原因不明的爆炸事件，於當地留下好幾個發光的綠色坑洞。 /// Settlement negotiations between the Ihan-rii protoss and Tyrador IX's leaders hit a snag when several terran factories in a disputed area mysteriously exploded, leaving glowing green craters.
Skin/Info/FleetBeacon=艦隊導航台的功能是強化附近星際之門與幽能矩陣的連結，讓大型主力艦可以透過躍傳運送。 /// Fleet beacons serve to strengthen the connection of any nearby stargate to the psionic matrix, enabling the warp transport of massive capital ships.
Skin/Info/FleetBeaconForged=塔達利姆艦隊導航台強制讓大量幽能穿過中央球體，藉以傳送巨大的裝甲戰艦。 /// The Tal'darim fleet beacon forces an almost certainly inadvisable amount of psionic energy through its central sphere, enabling the teleportation of massive and heavily armored warships.
Skin/Info/FleetBeaconIhanrii=伊翰利神族終於回到阿拉基爾，接下來他們打造出強大的艦隊導航台，想以此搜索宇宙各處，找出他們古代文明的倖存者。 /// Back on Arakyr at last, the Ihan-rii built powerful fleet beacons to scan the depths of space for other survivors of their ancient civilization.
Skin/Info/FleetBeaconTaldarim=
Skin/Info/Forge=冶煉廠裡有許多相位工匠不眠不休，為他們的弟兄改良武器、護甲，和船艦。這些精英工程師會不斷工作，直到收復艾爾的那天為止。 /// The forge houses phase-smiths working tirelessly to improve the weapons, armor, and ships of their brethren. These elite engineers will not rest until the day Aiur is reclaimed.
Skin/Info/ForgeForged=在卡達利姆冶煉廠裡，被囚禁的卡萊工程師遭到拷問，逼迫他們吐露技術秘密。 /// Inside Tal'darim forges, captured Khalai engineers are interrogated for their technological secrets. 
Skin/Info/ForgeIhanrii=伊翰利從阿拉基爾南極一帶的礦脈開採虛空水晶，再以真空密封方式存放在冶煉廠最深處的艙室裡面。 /// The Ihan-rii mine void crystals from veins along Arakyr's southern pole, storing them vacuum-sealed in their forges' deepest chambers.
Skin/Info/ForgeTaldarim=
Skin/Info/FusionCore=核融合核心中所進行的工作極度精密，研究員必須調控反物質與核能，來提升戰巡艦的威力。 /// The work undertaken in the fusion core is extremely delicate. Researchers here harness antimatter and nuclear power to increase battlecruiser capability.
Skin/Info/FusionCoreCovertOps=為了配合全新的命運女神級戰巡艦，核融合核心的能量輸出提升了四倍，但它的發熱特性並沒有因此隨之提高。 /// To accommodate the new Moirai-class battlecruiser, the fusion core's energy output was quadrupled without increasing its heat signature.
Skin/Info/FusionCoreSilver=液冷式核融合核心除了維持軌道戰巡艦隊的運作，同時也是泰拉朵九號星大多數賭場、水上樂園和機械按摩室的動力來源。 /// In addition to supporting the orbital battlecruiser fleet, liquid-cooled fusion cores provide most of the power for Tyrador IX's casinos, water parks, and robotic massage parlors.
Skin/Info/Gateway=群落戰爭之後，神族對古代薩爾納加的躍傳科技進行了逆向工程。傳送門因此可以在幾秒鐘內，運送戰士到遠方的戰場上。 /// Following the Brood War, the protoss reverse engineered the ancient warp technology of the xel'naga. Gateways can now transport warriors to distant battlefields within seconds.
Skin/Info/GatewayForged=塔達利姆傳送門可以躍傳的距離遠比卡萊的傳送門要長。但缺點是額外的能量有可能會讓乘客在旅途中化為碎片。 /// The Tal'darim gateway can warp warriors from much further away than its Khalai counterparts. One downside of the additional power is that passengers are occasionally torn to bits en route.
Skin/Info/GatewayIhanrii=由於人類某位權貴人士在拜訪伊翰利殖民地時誤觸傳送門，接觸到過量虛空能量導致該人士當場蒸發（而且還弄得現場一片混亂），泰拉朵九號星上面的種族關係面臨前所未見的嚴峻考驗。 /// Interspecies relations on Tyrador IX faced their toughest test yet when a terran dignitary visiting an Ihan-rii settlement touched a gateway and was immediately (and messily) vaporized by excess void energies.
Skin/Info/GatewayTaldarim=
Skin/Info/Ghost=幽靈特務是出類拔萃的人類特務單位，會利用他們與生俱有的幽能來使他們的奪命技能更加致命。這些探員無論是在滲透或是暗殺方面，都無人能出其右。 /// The ultimate terran covert operatives, ghosts harness their innate psionic potential to enhance their lethal skill sets. They are unrivaled in their ability to infiltrate and assassinate.
Skin/Info/GhostAcademy=自治聯盟成立之後，蒙斯克決定大幅修改幽靈特務計畫，於是成立了幽靈特務學院以及附屬的核彈發射井，來完整駕馭這股潛能。 /// After forming the Dominion, Mengsk sought to overhaul the ghost program. Dedicated ghost academies with attached nuclear silos were erected in order to fully harness this potential.
Skin/Info/GhostAcademyCovertOps=新式的幽靈特務學院改善了核彈發射井將輻射洩漏到隔壁訓練場的問題。 /// Newer ghost academies have ameliorated the issue of radiation leaking from nuclear silos into the neighboring training areas.
Skin/Info/GhostAcademySilver=當泰拉朵騎士發現地獄犬在幕後控制蟲族入侵時．立刻從傭兵中招募幽靈特務來追蹤和暗殺這間可惡企業的領導階層。 /// When it was discovered that Cerberus was responsible for the invasion of remote-control zerg, the Knights of Tyrador recruited mercenary ghosts to track down and assassinate the rogue corporation's leadership.
Skin/Info/GhostCovertOps=維勒安大帝近年來大幅改革幽靈特務的執行計畫，吸引許多更優秀、更忠誠的新血。他們完全依照自己的自由意志來執行任務。 /// Emperor Valerian has initiated various changes in the ghost program in recent years, resulting in better, more committed recruits who serve of their own free will.
Skin/Info/GhostEidolon=很少有幽靈特務能夠說自己是精英，因為能夠成功在嚴苛的工作環境中一路撐下來的人實在不多；只要你成為精英，都會擁有專屬於你的鬼影戰鬥服。 /// Few ghosts manage to survive the rigors of the program long enough to call themselves veterans, but those who do gain access to the highly exclusive Eidolon suits.
Skin/Info/GhostJunker=即使米拉‧韓有著迷人的性格，但依舊很難找到幽靈特務在她麾下效命。或許是因為幽靈特務偏好使用更精密的武器，而傭兵們通常無法提供。 /// Despite her charismatic personality, Mira Han has had nothing but trouble recruiting and retaining ghosts among her crew. Perhaps they prefer more sophisticated weaponry than mercs can offer.
Skin/Info/GhostNova=每個幽靈特務都是致命的特務密探，不過唯有以前段班成績畢業的幽靈特務才是最致命的。在戰場上，這些精英刺客在無數的行動中扮演著關鍵角色。 /// All ghosts are deadly covert operatives, but those who graduate at the head of their class are the deadliest. These elite assassins are at the center of countless battlefield operations.
Skin/Info/GhostSilver=幽靈特務精英會看守著重要的遊客。但他們的面具在參觀岩石行星之後遭到客訴：「拜託，那個面具嚇死人了！」從此之後他們就不使用面具了。 /// Elite ghosts guard Tyrador's most valuable tourists. Their visors were discontinued after a visiting rock star complained that "the masks freak me out, man."
Skin/Info/GhostUmojan=這些精英特務名為暗影護衛，是受雇來保護尤摩捷護衛軍的秘密，同時保衛和平的部隊。 /// Known as shadowguards, these elite operatives are employed to keep the secrets of the Umojan Protectorate, as well as the peace.
Skin/Info/GreaterSpireMecha=官方指出，擬態機甲計畫從來沒有成功複製出巨型螺旋塔。而針對相關的照片證據，自治聯盟代表也出面澄清了那不過只是精細的仿製品而已。
Skin/Info/Hatchery=每個殖民地都需要一個核心來分解晶礦，製造幼蟲，還有產生蟲苔。孵化所擁有蟲族所有品系的基因藍圖。 /// Every colony needs a heart. From digesting minerals to creating larva to generating creep, hatcheries hold the genetic blueprints for the zerg.
Skin/Info/HatcheryMecha=當擬態機甲計畫所複製的孵化所不明地開始產生與蟲苔毫無差異的物質時，計畫主持人就得煩惱更麻煩的問題了。 /// By the time the Simulant Project's replica hatcheries began mysteriously producing a substance indistinguishable from creep, the directors had bigger problems to worry about. 
Skin/Info/HatcheryRCZ=地獄犬確定無人發現他們成功滲透泰拉朵九號星的地下環境後，著手在這顆行星的廣大熔岩通道中安置可遠端控制的孵化所。 /// After verifying that their infiltration of Tyrador IX's subterranean environment had escaped detection, Cerberus began seeding the planet's extensive lava tubes with remote-operated hatcheries.
Skin/Info/HatcheryRemastered=刀鋒女皇消失後，蟲族蟲后爭相爭奪控制權。許多弱小的蟲后遭到置換，並且從所屬的群落消失無蹤。剩下的蟲后找到被遺棄、處於休眠狀態的孵化所，努力建立新的群落。 /// The zerg broodmothers vied for dominance over one another in the absence of the Queen of Blades. Many of those who were weak were displaced from their colonies and perished. Others discovered abandoned, dormant hatcheries and set to work raising new broods.
Skin/Info/Hellion=惡狼是種速度很快的攻擊單位，配有輕型裝甲，能快速發動突擊和進行迴避動作。在傭兵公司裡面相當受歡迎。 /// High-speed raiders with lightweight chassis, hellions excel at lightning-fast strike missions and evasive maneuvering. They are particularly popular with mercenary companies.
Skin/Info/HellionCovertOps=精緻地運用大膽的三輪設計，讓這台惡狼的外型更加流線靈活，比之前更好操控。對了，駕駛員之間的對話也比以往更加有趣。 /// Refined to utilize a bold, three-wheel design, this hellion is sleeker and easier to steer than ever before. Word among the drivers is that it's even more fun, too.
Skin/Info/HellionJunker=這些經過改裝的惡狼，原本是給地下破壞組織使用的；結果在偏遠星球，變成一些專門掠奪資源的幫派最愛用的載具。 /// Originally modified for underground demolition leagues, these Hellions have become the preferred vehicles of the fringe worlds' notorious junker gangs.
Skin/Info/HellionJunkerMM=惡狼的設計目標就是為了讓駕駛員盡快脫離危險情況，而且實務上運作得不錯。惡狼還裝置了非法的戰鬥藥劑噴灑器，但傭兵們對此不做任何回應。 /// These hellions were made to get their drivers out of bad situations quickly and look good in the process. They may also have illegal stim emitters, but the mercs are tight-lipped about them.
Skin/Info/HellionSilver=泰拉朵惡狼上那些拉風的鉻合金輪圈是和街頭賽車時尚教主JJ Hyun合作設計的。 /// The stylish chrome rims on the Tyrador hellion were designed in collaboration with street racer-turned-fashion icon JJ Hyun.
Skin/Info/HellionUmojan=尤摩捷的人可以享受駕駛的樂趣，都是因為這台精心設計的惡狼。他有跑車等級的改良式懸吊系統、具有防禦能力的合金板，甚至還有舒適的駕駛座。 /// Umojans drive in style thanks to their sophisticated hellions, which sport improved suspension, defensive plating, and even more comfortable seats for their drivers.
Skin/Info/HighTemplar=在神族中，高階聖堂武士是最受人敬重、戰鬥經驗最豐富的戰士。他們將自身幽能提升到驚人的境界，他們的心智就是最強大的武器。 /// The high templar are the most respected and experienced warriors of the protoss race. Having honed their psionic abilities to an awe-inspiring degree, their minds are their greatest weapon.
Skin/Info/HighTemplarGolden=席拉克高階聖堂武士是第一個穿上古代裝甲，來紀念卡斯和他在統一神族的貢獻上所扮演的角色。他們藉由擁抱輝煌的過去，來迴避對未來困境的恐懼。 /// The Shelak high templar were the first to wear ancient armor in recognition of Khas and his role in uniting the templar. By embracing the glorious past, they quiet their fears about the troubled future.
Skin/Info/HighTemplarIhanrii=「澤拉圖」發出的求救訊號將他們從靜滯狀態喚醒，但伊翰利神族聯繫不上他。於是伊翰利神族決定回到那個他們之前稱為家的地方。 /// Unable to reach the "Zeratul" whose distress signal had wrested them from deep stasis, the Ihan-rii protoss made their way to the system that, long ago, they had called home. 
Skin/Info/HighTemplarPurifier=在大量的實驗之後，淨化者終於讓A.I.戰士有能力使用與達蘭高階聖堂武士完全相同的技能。據說亞坦尼斯大主教本人對此也是嘖嘖稱奇。 /// After extensive experimentation, the Purifiers have perfected AI warriors that possess the same distinctive abilities as the high templar in the Daelaam. Hierarch Artanis himself is said to be impressed.
Skin/Info/HighTemplarTaldarim=塔達力姆透過拉克希爾儀式，在飛升之鍊往上爬。長年吸收態化氫及侍奴的生命精華，讓飛升者的威力更勝以往。 /// Through Rak'Shir, the Tal'darim climb the Chain of Ascension. Years of absorbing terrazine and the essence of their supplicants have made these ascendants powerful indeed.
Skin/Info/HiveMecha=在出現數個擬態機甲蟲穴進一步突變為成熟蟲巢的案例後，一旦有人擁有執行此研究的經驗，就有可能開始一連串鉅細靡遺的調查。
Skin/Info/Hydralisk=刺蛇的存在目的就是成為讓敵人聞風喪膽的恐怖殺手。牠們以強韌的肌肉組織，從蟲殼之間高速射出的脊刺，就連新型鋼鐵都能打穿。 /// Evolved to be nightmarish killers, hydralisks boast robust musculature that allows them to eject the spines between their carapace plating with such speed that they can puncture neosteel.
Skin/Info/HydraliskDen=蟲族使用溫和的惰蛇做為結構，將它進化為刺蛇獸穴。而隨著時間過去，它也逐漸發展出外骨骼構造來保護下方的血肉。 /// The zerg took the structure of the peaceful slothien and evolved it to create the hydralisk den. Over time, it has developed a biological exoskeleton to protect its flesh.
Skin/Info/HydraliskDenMecha=研究者一直無法找出刺蛇獸穴長出釩合金刀刃的原因，而且也找不到是哪個人把刀刃放在那裡的。 /// Investigators were never able to ascertain the purpose of the deadly vanadium blades sprouting from the hydralisk den, nor the individual responsible for placing them there.
Skin/Info/HydraliskDenRCZ=地獄犬對入侵泰拉朵九號星勢在必得，因此需要展示「在實體環境提高刺蛇20%產能效率」等實驗成果，進而爭取更多資金。 /// Abandoning the invasion of Tyrador IX was never an option for Cerberus, which needs to demonstrate metrics like "+20% hydralisk production efficiency in real-world scenarios" to earn out its funding agreements.
Skin/Info/HydraliskMecha=擬態機甲刺蛇會對它的創造者造成重大的危險，於是他們選擇將爪子替換成在組裝過程中容易變鈍的刀刃。 /// Simulant hydralisks posed a significant risk to their creators, who chose to replace their claws with blades that could be easily dulled during the assembly process.
Skin/Info/HydraliskNoxious=第一個在遺傳因子編入劇毒基因序的蟲族是雷獸，不過現在刺蛇也具有這種基因了。牠們繼承的不只是超強的毒性，連外觀也變得更加兇惡。 /// Though the noxious strain of zerg first emerged in ultralisks, it has since spread to include hydralisks as well. These specimens have inherited the strain's signature toxic characteristics, along with a more ferocious appearance.
Skin/Info/HydraliskPrimal=蟲群的刺蛇很快就與原生蟲族族群融合，並保留了大部分原來的特徵。這顯然是牠們在演化上具有優勢的證據。 /// Swarm hydralisks were quickly integrated into primal zerg packs, where they kept many of their original traits. Clearly this is a testament to their evolutionary strength.
Skin/Info/HydraliskRCZ=地獄犬刺蛇在沙塵暴期間突破了新迦南的防禦陣地，因為它們發亮的眼睛被誤認為是沙地越野車的頭燈。 /// Cerberus hydralisks penetrated New Canaan's defense perimeter during a dust storm, when their luminescent eyes were mistaken for dune buggy headlights.
Skin/Info/HydraliskRemastered=刺蛇在早期演化階段擁有較細的脊刺，和五顏六色的頭冠，讓人印象深刻。 /// Earlier Hydralisk evolutions were characterized by slimmer spikes and an imposing, colorful crest.
Skin/Info/HydraliskWebby=利維坦群落的刺蛇，一直保有變形成遁地獸所需的基因序。其實，構成遁地獸外觀的重要因子，是直接編寫在牠們的DNA裡面。 /// Hydralisks of the Leviathan Brood never lost the genetic sequences necessary to metamorphize into lurkers. Indeed, elements of the lurkers' appearance are woven directly into their DNA.
Skin/Info/Immortal=受人尊崇的神族英雄過世後，遺骸會被移植到機械外骨骼的身體裡面。配有厚重護甲的不朽者是最忠誠的戰士。 /// When revered protoss heroes fall, their remains are transplanted into robotic exoskeletons. These heavily armed and shielded immortals are among the most loyal of warriors.
Skin/Info/ImmortalAdun=對神族來說，沒有比自我犧牲更崇高的榮耀了。亞頓比誰都了解這點，也因此使得不朽者備受尊崇。 /// To the protoss, there is no greater honor than self-sacrifice. Adun understood this most of all, and it is in his name that the immortals are consecrated.
Skin/Info/ImmortalGolden=末日之戰以後，某些死亡的聖堂武士被推舉放進古代不朽者的外骨骼當中，來彰顯他們試圖聯合紛亂神族的奉獻決心。 /// After the End War, some fallen templar elected to be placed into ancient immortal exoskeletons to show their dedication to the ideals that united the protoss in times of trouble.
Skin/Info/ImmortalIhanrii=英勇戰死的伊翰利英雄會被放在有四足步行的機械石棺中保存。這些石棺會帶著遺體上戰場，並且裝備著巨大的火砲。 /// Ihan-rii heroes who die honorably are interred in four-legged robotic sarcophagi, which carry their remains to future battles, armed with tremendous cannons.
Skin/Info/ImmortalPurifier=末日之戰之後，淨化者再次利用了死亡的不朽者軀體，讓他們成為純粹的機械戰士繼續運作。 /// In the aftermath of the End War, the Purifiers have been able to repurpose the shells of deceased immortals so they can continue functioning as purely robotic fighters.
Skin/Info/ImmortalTaldarim=失敗蒙羞的塔達力姆戰士，為了尋求雪恥的機會，自願進入這台裝甲攻擊機械。他們唯一的願望就是為了大領主而死。 /// Encased within armored assault frames, Tal'darim warriors who are felled in failure and disgrace seek the opportunity to erase their shame. Their hope is to die well in service of their Highlord.
Skin/Info/InfestationPit=感染巢內各式基因不斷競爭，培養出一系列的病原體、瘟疫帶原細胞，以及神經寄生物。感染蟲只會運用其中最有效率的產物。 /// The infestation pit is where genetics run wild, cultivating a vast array of diseases, plague cells, and neural parasites. Only the most efficient of these maladies are utilized by infestors. 
Skin/Info/InfestationPitMecha=擬態機甲AI發生錯誤時，首先會出現感染巢停止回應維修人員的跡象。 /// The first suggestion of a Simulant Project AI malfunction came when the infestor den stopped responding to its maintenance technicians.
Skin/Info/InfestationPitRCZ=從妥善分佈於各地的感染巢所散布的神經寄生蟲，保證能讓碰巧進入由地獄犬所控制的熔岩通道探勘的人，在回報遭遇技術困難後從此消失無蹤。 /// Neural parasites from judiciously distributed infestation pits ensure that any adventurous spelunkers who happen across Cerberus-occupied lava tubes report technical difficulties, then are never heard from again.
Skin/Info/Infestor=感染蟲正如其名，會感染牠們所到之處，擴大蟲族的影響範圍。牠們會將神經寄生蟲注入生物體內，把敵人轉化為沒有自我意志的蟲族士兵。 /// True to their name, infestors spread the Swarm's influence wherever they go. Organisms that are injected with an infestor's neural parasites become the zerg's mindless soldiers.
Skin/Info/InfestorMecha=研究者原本創造了AI來複製感染蟲的神經寄生行為，但最後以失敗收場。正當研究者將感染蟲移出產線時，寄生行為的AI開始正常運作了… /// Researchers failed to create an AI that replicated the infestors' neural parasites. They were removing the infestors from production when, unexpectedly, the parasites' AI began functioning perfectly...
Skin/Info/InfestorPrimal=感染蟲常常是原生蟲族族群中較大、較兇惡競爭者的目標，因此他們發展出了更厚的背部甲殼來保護自己。 /// As frequent targets of larger, more vicious competitors within their pack, primal infestors have evolved thickened plating along their back to protect themselves. 
Skin/Info/InfestorRCZ=為了回應企業客戶的需求，地獄犬在脆弱的感染蟲體內，植入了有支撐作用的鈦結構。 /// In response to feedback from an important corporate client, Cerberus implanted the notoriously fragile infestor with supportive titanium infrastructure.
Skin/Info/InfestorWebby=作為殖體生物，構成司令塔的有機組織會有各式各樣不同功能。以利維坦感染蟲來舉例，牠們的基礎生物防禦構造就非常明顯。 /// As a colony creature, the organisms comprising the borboru matriarch took many different functions. Within Leviathan infestors, the defensive structures of the base creature are more pronounced.
Skin/Info/LairMecha=當第一個擬態機甲孵化所突變成蟲穴時，內部審查機制隨即啟動，不過始終沒有發現應該為此負責的工程師。
Skin/Info/Larva=這些低調，蛆一般的有機生物，在外層覆蓋著與外貌不相稱的強韌表皮，並且它有能力突變為各式各樣的恐怖蟲族。 /// This unassuming, maggot-like organism is covered in an deceptively strong hide and capable of mutating into any number of horrors.
Skin/Info/LarvaMecha=讓擬態機甲能相互以視覺辨識，一直是打造在輪廓與行動方式上與本體極為相似的機甲幼蟲的理由。但這無法解釋擬態機甲計畫的科學家同時複製出壓扁蟲族幼蟲聲音的理由。 /// Visual recognition among Simulants is a common justification for creating mecha larvae that resemble their inspirations in silhouette and gait. This doesn't entirely explain why Simulant Project engineers felt it necessary to replicate the zerg larva's signature squelching noises.
Skin/Info/LarvaRCZ=地獄犬投入大量精力，將獨特並且往往會引發痛苦的刺激物應用於他們孵育出的蟲族幼蟲的變態過程。 /// Cerberus invested a great deal of effort in mapping unique and often painful stimuli to the metamorphoses of the zerg larva in which they resulted.
Skin/Info/Liberator=解放者的前身是地球聯合理事會的女武神，原始用途是用來對付空中的敵人。後來加裝了空對地武器，因此能夠清除敵方地面部隊。 /// Inspired by the UED’s valkyries, liberators were originally designed to combat aerial threats. The addition of air-to-ground artillery allows them to also deal with terrestrial enemy forces.
Skin/Info/LiberatorCovertOps=運用近期在新型鋼鐵結構的改良，成功設計出更複雜的解放者裝甲，整個變形過程變得更加流暢，讓自治聯盟艦隊全都羨慕不已。 /// Recent improvements in neosteel construction have led to more complex plating designs that augment the liberator's transformation process, making it the envy of the Dominion fleet.
Skin/Info/LiberatorJunker=米拉‧韓在一場戲劇性的牌局中贏得了所有解放者。但不幸的是，她不久之後又把他們輸給了另一個傭兵。 /// Mira Han won all of her liberators in just one incredibly dramatic poker game. Unfortunately, she lost them all to a rival mercenary just a short time later.
Skin/Info/LiberatorSilver=泰拉朵九號星上的解放者配備了大量前方照明燈，大大提高了深夜在這個星球荒野巡邏時的視野能見度。 /// Liberators on Tyrador IX are equipped with numerous front-facing floodlights, increasing visibility during late-night patrols of the planet's stunning wilderness. 
Skin/Info/LiberatorUmojan=尤摩捷護衛軍只花了幾年，就自己開發出了知名的解放者。它的後方推進器經過完全重新設計，讓泰倫自治聯盟的工程團隊相當羨慕。 /// It only took a few years for the Umojan Protectorate to unleash its version of the famous Liberator. Its wholly re-imagined rear thrusters have become the envy of the Terran Dominion engineering team.
Skin/Info/Lurker=在野生蟲巢裡面取得早已消失的基因序，讓遁地獸又重回蟲群行列。牠們會從敵人看不見的地底下發出攻擊，殲滅敵人。 /// The lurker was believed lost until its sequences were recovered from a feral hive cluster. Now, the lurkers serve the Swarm once again, annihilating their foes from the darkness below.
Skin/Info/LurkerDen=遠觀之下，遁地獸穴似乎有更多部份是由白骨組成。直到接近觀察之後，才會發現表面的材質更像是有溝槽的厚皮革。 /// From a distance, the lurker den appears to be more bone than flesh. Upon closer inspection, the exterior is more like a grooved, thick leather.
Skin/Info/LurkerDenMecha=打造尖端為奈米級的脊刺會產生大量的熱，而擬態機甲遁地獸穴會利用複雜的排氣網路和冷卻鰭片將熱發散出去。 /// The process of forging nano-tipped lurker spines generates tremendous heat, which the Simulant lurker den dissipates through a convoluted network of vents and cooling fins.
Skin/Info/LurkerDenRCZ=地獄犬預先考慮到強化警戒以及在重要區域暗中佈局防禦的需求，於是大量生產遁地獸穴作為感染泰拉朵九號星的支援手段。 /// Anticipating the need for advance lookouts and a stealthy first line of defense, Cerberus produced an abundance of lurker dens to support their infestation of Tyrador IX.
Skin/Info/LurkerMecha=大量的地底測試讓遁地獸機械化相當成功，但遁地獸尖刺的形狀需要重新設計，來應付鈍物撞擊的狀況。 /// Extensive subterranean tests yielded a capable mechanized lurker, aside from its spikes, which were reshaped to better perform under blunt force impact.
Skin/Info/LurkerPrimal=某些原生刺蛇發生了突變，因此擁有更多遁地獸的特性。牠們目前的型態，比牠們的刺蛇始祖更像是遁地獸。 /// Some of the primal hydralisks developed mutations that led them to exhibit an increasing number of lurker characteristics. At this point, they resemble lurkers more than their hydralisk ancestors.
Skin/Info/LurkerRCZ=一隊伊翰利神族出發前往泰拉朵九號星地表調查，因為地獄犬遁地獸先前埋伏在降落地點，造成了一場大屠殺。 /// A company of Ihan-rii protoss dispatched to investigate the surface of Tyrador IX were  massacred by Cerberus lurkers that happened to be burrowed at the landing site.
Skin/Info/LurkerWebby=在利維坦群落中，刺蛇和遁地獸之間的先天關聯性是沒有其他蟲族生物能相比的。例如，牠們在變形後都會產生許多巨型脊刺。 /// The innate connection between hydralisks and lurkers within the Leviathan Brood is unparalleled among the Swarm. As such, their metamorphosis yields a considerable number of additional seismic spines.
Skin/Info/Marauder=掠奪者是會走路的坦克，是自治聯盟專為穿透蟲族的堅硬蟲殼而打造的，不過他們所配備的手榴彈也很適合用來對付各種不同的目標。 /// Marauders are walking tanks, designed by the Dominion to combat the hardened carapaces of the zerg. Their grenades are effective against a variety of other targets, as well.
Skin/Info/MarauderCovertOps=當自治聯盟特種部隊進行掠奪者裝備改進的意見調查時，其中之一的選項：給我們更大管的武器，獲得壓倒性的支持。武器研究人員欣然照辦。 /// When the Dominion Special Forces surveyed their personnel for improvements on marauder suits, only one dominated the conversation--bigger guns. The weapons researchers gladly obliged.
Skin/Info/MarauderDeluxe=CMC-660重型戰鬥服近來的改進已經通過審核，接受自願者進行實地測試。幸好在部隊裡有許多掠奪者踴躍報名。 /// Recent improvements to the CMC-660 Heavy Combat Suit have been approved for voluntary field testing. Luckily, there are plenty of marauders in the corps who could use the credits.
Skin/Info/MarauderJunker=身為米拉‧韓傭兵團最早的成員，這些掠奪者在傭兵界裡有著不尋常的忠誠…但也有可能只是米拉勒索他們的手法特別高明。 /// As some of the original members of Mira Han's crew, these marauders are unusually loyal compared to others in the mercenary world... or Han just has exceptionally compelling blackmail on them.
Skin/Info/MarauderSilver=泰拉朵的掠奪者重量幾乎是自治聯盟標準版本的兩倍。工程師利用強化的液壓系統和更大的排氣量來彌補這個重量差異。 /// The Tyrador marauder weighs almost twice the Dominion standard. Engineers compensated for the extra density with enhanced hydraulics and exhaust.
Skin/Info/MarauderUmojan=CMC戰鬥服做了一些特殊改進，讓這些掠奪者有強化夜視能力的選項，上半部的結構也經過大幅強化，來支撐更重的榴彈發射器。 /// Special advancements in CMC armor have given these marauders improved night vision options, as well as a heavily reinforced upper frame to support their weightier grenade launchers. 
Skin/Info/Marine=陸戰隊站在各個星區的最前線保衛著人類的世界。這裡面成員可能是罪犯、反抗軍或愛國分子，但不論是何種人，都已隨時做好戰鬥的準備。 /// Marines are the first line of defense for terran worlds across the sector. Comprised of convicts, rebels and patriots alike, they're always ready for a fight.
Skin/Info/MarineCovertOps=一個人在自治聯盟特種部隊的服役時間也許不會太久，不過有一點是所有陸戰隊一致同意的：這份工作，讓你一刻不得閒。 /// One's service in the Dominion Special Forces may not always last long, but all marines can agree that there's never a dull moment on the job.
Skin/Info/MarineJunker=那些在問傭兵的武器上為什麼要有刺刀的人，一定沒和他們一起參與過迴水酒吧大混戰的盛況。 /// Those who ask why these mercenaries carry bladed weapons have clearly never been in a backwater bar fight with them.
Skin/Info/MarineRemastered=打過群落戰爭的陸戰隊都很懷念當時穿的裝甲，他們說那裝甲的舒適度現在的根本不能比。 /// Marines who fought in the Brood War often express nostalgia for the armor they wore back then, which they claim was significantly more comfortable.
Skin/Info/MarineSilver=守衛泰拉朵渡假村和海灘的傭兵陸戰隊們，都是最有經驗的老兵。他們因為工作輕鬆，報酬優渥才被吸引到這裡來。 /// The mercenary marines who guard Tyrador's resorts and beaches are mostly grizzled veterans lured to the system by the promise of an easy gig and generous pay.
Skin/Info/MarineUmojan=尤摩捷陸戰隊最近對於裝甲升級相當興奮，這項官方政策讓新兵的安全性和平均部署時間都獲得提升。不過，這有可能是為了將來的戰事做準備。 /// Umojan marines have recently seen exciting armor upgrades—officially to increase the safety and average deployment time of recruits, but possibly as preparation for a future conflict.
Skin/Info/MarineXPR=儘管戰豬因為酗酒和在酒吧中的粗暴舉止而聲名狼藉，但他們卻是這個星區中最可靠的傭兵。 /// Despite their reputation as heavy drinkers and barroom brawlers, the War Pigs are some of the most dependable mercenaries in the sector.
Skin/Info/Medivac=醫療艇兼具空投與醫療能力，在部署兵力的同時，還能縮短讓傷兵重回戰場的時間。 /// Functioning as both a dropship and a medical bay, medivacs allow for simultaneous troop deployment and triage, reducing the time required to redeploy wounded soldiers.
Skin/Info/MedivacCovertOps=因應最近秘密行動部隊執勤時死亡率居高不下，自治聯盟領導階層同意編制大量醫療艇，好降低人員傷亡。 /// In response to considerable losses on a recent covert ops mission, the Dominion leadership has approved the use of medivacs on a greater number of assignments, with the goal of reducing casualties.
Skin/Info/MedivacJunker=儘管傭兵們在戰鬥中通常只能自求多福，但偶爾當任務中有重要人士時，就會讓改裝的醫療艇出動。 /// Though mercenaries are used to taking their chances in battle, occasionally their missions involve important enough personnel to merit the use of one of these customized medivacs.
Skin/Info/MedivacSilver=儘管擁有大量有經驗的飛行員，泰拉朵九號星的醫療艇，大多還是用來救援把遊艇弄到擱淺的有錢遊客。 /// Though staffed by experienced pilots, medivacs on Tyrador IX are mostly used to rescue wealthy tourists who wreck their luxury yachts on reefs in the emerald seas.
Skin/Info/MedivacUmojan=尤摩捷護衛軍的醫療艇駕駛會接受大量醫護訓練，而士兵的壽命也因此達到平均值以上。 /// The extensive medical training of medivac pilots has been credited for the longer than average soldier lifespan in the Umojan Protectorate.
Skin/Info/MissileTurret=儘管這些防禦性建築很容易故障，要對付空中來的攻擊還是相當有效率，而且還能偵測到躲藏的敵人。 /// Although these defensive structures are prone to breaking down, they effectively target aerial attackers and are capable of detecting hidden foes.
Skin/Info/MissileTurretCovertOps=感謝特種部隊飛彈砲台簡約低調的設計，敵方船艦經常直到進入火線範圍當中，才能察覺它的存在。 /// Thanks to their sleek, low-profile design, special forces missile turrets often remain undetected until enemy ships are directly within their line of fire.
Skin/Info/MissileTurretSilver=雖然伊翰利宣稱他們快速擴張虛空艦隊僅是為了儀式典禮之用，不過泰拉朵騎士還是大量部署飛彈砲塔以防萬一。 /// Though the Ihan-rii claim their fast-growing void ray fleet is intended for ceremonial purposes only, the Knights of Tyrador have begun a massive expansion of their missile turret network just in case.
Skin/Info/Mothership=聖母艦是神族最強大的船艦，也是神族的星際指揮中心，只要一艘便能扭轉戰爭的局勢，同時也是黃金艦隊的旗艦。 /// The ultimate protoss vessel, Motherships serve as star-faring command centers that can single-handedly decide the outcome of a battle. They are the flagships of the Golden Armada.
Skin/Info/MothershipGolden=即使聖母艦一直都維持著良好的狀態，但因為對聖堂武士黃金紀元的重新燃起的熱情，讓這些無價的船艦受到了新一波的支援和關注。 /// Though motherships have always been well-maintained, the revival of interest in the golden age of the Templar has resulted in a new wave of support and care for the priceless vessels.
Skin/Info/MothershipIhanrii=伊翰利神族相信他們是薩爾納加的真正繼承者。他們也光榮地將這樣的信念，以符文寫在聖母艦上。 /// The Ihan-rii protoss believe themselves to be the only true descendants of the xel'naga, a message they convey proudly in the runes that adorn their motherships. 
Skin/Info/MothershipPurifier=為了能和聖堂武士平起平坐，淨化者開始打造自己的巨大聖母艦。 /// In the interest of presenting themselves as equals to the templar, the Purifiers have begun constructing their own massive motherships.
Skin/Info/MothershipTaldarim=死亡艦隊的聖母艦，擁有足以操控戰局的威力。艦隊首領會如同王者一般，坐在名為聖母艦的王座之上，俯視敵軍的遍野屍骸。 /// The death fleet's motherships are equipped for total battlefield domination. Each one is a throne from which a Tal'darim fleet lord oversees the ruin of their foes.
Skin/Info/Mutalisk=很少有什麼能像滿天飛螳一樣讓人怵目驚心。牠們在空中射出來的刃蟲共生體，能輕易讓敵人潰不成軍。 /// Few things are as terrifying as a sky blotted out by the wings of mutalisks. The glave wurm symbiotes they expel can easily ravage entire armies from above.
Skin/Info/MutaliskMecha=儘管飛螳在一開始的重量測試中不太順利，但最後的成功讓擬態計畫獲得許多投資人的青睞，而其中有些人的動機十分可疑。 /// Though the mutalisk struggled with initial weight tests, its eventual success led to many new investors for the Simulant Project--some of them with ulterior motivations.
Skin/Info/MutaliskPrimal=原生飛螳千變萬化，特別在翅膀與尾部的型態上更是多樣化。這個品系一般也擁有較黯淡的色彩，才能在各種不同的環境中隱藏自身的存在。 /// The primal mutalisks are everchanging, particularly when it comes to their wings and tails. This strain also features subdued coloring, allowing them to conceal themselves in many different environments.
Skin/Info/MutaliskRCZ=一群地獄犬飛螳，就能讓泰拉朵九號星的新手維京戰機飛行員無法招架。對他們來說，從古代石製戰艦上出現的伊翰利神族，才是更難纏的對手。 /// Swarms of Cerberus mutalisks outmaneuvered the inexperienced viking pilots defending Tyrador IX, but they faced a tougher foe when the Ihan-rii protoss descended in ancient stone ships.
Skin/Info/MutaliskWebby=飛螳是利維坦群落的恐怖武力。據說，在戰鬥中牠們協調一致有如單一個體，化為一個足以遮蔽天空的強悍集團。 /// Mutalisks comprise a vast number of the Leviathan Brood's forces. It is said that they function as one mind in battle, a singular unyielding mass that blacks out the sky.
Skin/Info/Nexus=星核的作用是神族在銀河間連結幽能矩陣時的定位點，而近來的科技進步讓這些定位點有能力操縱空間和時間。 /// The nexus acts as an anchor allowing protoss to access the psionic matrix across the galaxy. Recent technological advancements have enabled these focal points to manipulate space and time itself.
Skin/Info/NexusForged=塔達利姆在很久以前就改造了劫來的卡萊星核，讓建築風格更加狂野。在星核的頂端還安裝了超載的凱達林水晶，並利用幽能尖刺來限制它的力量。 /// Long ago, the Tal'darim adapted a captured Khalai nexus to maximize its architectural brutality, with a supercharged khaydarin crystal restrained by psionic prongs at its peak. 
Skin/Info/NexusIhanrii=即使伊翰利神族歡迎人類代表團進入殖民地參觀，但是他們發出詭異聲音和心跳聲響的壯麗石頭星核仍是禁區。 /// The Ihan-rii welcome terran delegations into their settlements, but never inside their imposing stone nexuses, from which strange ululations and distant heartbeat-sounds emanate.
Skin/Info/NexusRemastered=群落戰爭後，達蘭神族投入大量相位工匠，以最新的時間扭曲科技來翻新舊型星核。 /// Following the Brood War, the Daelaam dedicated a great many phase-smiths to retrofit older nexuses with the latest chronal distortion technology.
Skin/Info/NydusNetwork=蟲殖地網是從群集的地下通道進化而來，蟲后打算利用它來突擊與擴張。蟲殖地網經過化學物質刺激後會形成隧道，從地底穿越整個戰場。 /// Nydus networks evolved from a combination of nydus canals and the desire of broodmothers to surprise and swarm. When activated by chemical stimuli, nydus networks form tunnels underground across the battlefield.
Skin/Info/NydusNetworkMecha=擬態機甲計畫解散之後，對研究機構進行了觀測儀掃描。結果發現未經許可的蟲殖地網形成了複雜的網路，以蜂窩狀分布在整個機構當中。 /// A scanner sweep conducted after the dissolution of the Simulant Project revealed a convoluted network of unauthorized nydus tunnels honeycombing the facility.
Skin/Info/NydusNetworkRCZ=可遠程控制的蟲殖地網，能讓第二次入侵泰拉朵九號星的部隊同時出現在該星球各地，好為地獄犬的執行董事會帶來更大收益。 /// Remote-operated nydus networks ensure that the second invasion of Tyrador IX will come from everywhere at once, hopefully facilitating an outcome more palatable to the Cerberus executive board.
Skin/Info/NydusWormMecha=儘管擬態機甲地下蠕蟲缺乏原本無法摧毀的肌肉與骨骼構造，但內部的氣味好聞多了。
Skin/Info/Observer=觀察者具有複雜的感應裝置，能夠在短時間內取得大量資料。它們藉由收集到的重要情資，一次又一次的改變戰鬥局勢。 /// Complex sensor matrices allow observers to collect massive amounts of data in a short amount of time. The critical intelligence they provide has turned the tide of battle time and again.
Skin/Info/ObserverGolden=舊型觀察者有不同的穩定器設定，但效果一樣好，而這些舊型觀察者也因此獲得了更多不同凡響的看法。有些相位工匠宣稱這樣的設定也會改善效能，但從未經過驗證。 /// Older observers had a different stabilizer configuration that, though equally effective, gave them with a more imposing aspect. Some phase-smiths claim that it also boosts performance, but this is unverified. 
Skin/Info/ObserverIhanrii=千年以來，伊翰利神族就一直部署著觀察者，來監控其他神族和蟲族的地盤。而且從來沒有被發現過。 /// For millennia, the Ihan-rii have deployed observers to monitor the other protoss sects and the zerg without concern of being discovered.
Skin/Info/ObserverPurifier=淨化者勢力特別重視觀察者，菲尼克斯本人尤其如此。 /// Observers are greatly prized among the Purifier forces, having found especially strong favor with Fenix himself.
Skin/Info/ObserverTaldarim=想要順利欺騙敵人和讓詭計生效，最重要的就是偵察。 最精明的飛升者會大量利用觀察員來偵察史雷因的敵人...以及其他飛升者。 /// Reconnaissance is essential for effective deception and subterfuge. The most cunning ascendants make extensive use of observers to spy on Slayn's enemies... and on each other.
Skin/Info/Oracle=尼拉辛姆長久以來遭到艾爾放逐，也因此讓他們得以進行新科技的實驗。敏捷的先知艦就是這類實驗的成功案例。 /// During their long exile from Aiur, the Nerazim were free to experiment with new technologies. The agile oracle vessels are an excellent example of how fruitful this exploration could be.
Skin/Info/OracleGolden=守舊派的聖堂武士還在借用尼拉辛姆的科技，只改變外觀來迎合他們的喜好。大族長芙菈森拒絕為此做法發表任何評論。 /// Templar traditionalists still borrow technology from the Nerazim, choosing to change only the aesthetics to suit their preferences. Matriarch Vorazun has declined to comment on this practice.
Skin/Info/OracleIhanrii=伊翰利神族派出了先知艦，來調查靠近泰拉朵九號星軌道的巨獸級戰巡艦。 /// The Ihan-rii dispatched oracles to investigate the Behemoth-class battlecruiser that approached them in orbit around Tyrador IX.
Skin/Info/OraclePurifier=儘管在初期遭遇到許多設計上的挑戰，聰明的相位工匠還是成功打造出了與尼拉辛姆先知艦十分相似的船艦。 /// Though initially beset by design challenges, clever phase-smiths have been able to engineer vessels similar to the Nerazim oracles.
Skin/Info/OracleTaldarim=長久以來，塔達力姆一直著迷於尼拉辛姆的時間控制技術。偷來的先知艦會交由它們的新主人，也就是艦隊首領加以謹慎保護。 /// The Tal'darim have long coveted the Nerazim's temporal mastery. Stolen oracles are jealously guarded by the fleet lords who control them.
Skin/Info/OrbitalCommandCovertOps=星軌指揮總部的最新科技掃描儀讓大多數的偵察任務變得不再必需，以往會被派去偵察敵情的低階陸戰隊都因此降低了不少工作壓力。
Skin/Info/OverSeerWebby=利維坦群落的監察王蟲特別強化了偵查能力，牠們的鰭和觸鬚讓牠們能在大氣與水中以最小阻力移動。 /// Bred to specialize in reconnaissance, the fins and tendrils of the Leviathan overseers allow them to cut through both air and water with minimal effort.
Skin/Info/Overlord=對蟲族的蟲巢來說，王蟲扮演十分重要的角色，除了散佈蟲苔，牠還能將蟲后以幽能發出的指令，傳達給進化程度較低的下等蟲族。 /// Overlords perform a critical function for a zerg hive cluster-- spreading creep and relaying psionic commands from a broodmother to the less evolved organisms she controls. 
Skin/Info/OverlordMecha=王蟲是擬態計畫早期的作品，它由一位實驗室的科學家所操控，讓它在行動中佔領重要又安全的位置。 /// An early creation during the course of the Simulant Project, the overlord is carefully controlled by a lab scientist, making it a critical safety point in the entire operation.
Skin/Info/OverlordPrimal=像德哈卡之類的原生蟲族族群領袖，已經演化到不需要王蟲的階段。但有少數領袖還是保留了這個過去的特徵。 /// Some primal zerg pack leaders, like Dehaka, have evolved beyond the need of overlords, but a few of them nonetheless remain as vestiges of the past.
Skin/Info/OverlordRCZ=即使是位於低可見度的環境中，地獄犬王蟲還是會利用熾熱的能量光束來標定位置，比方說泰拉朵九號星的濃霧河岸和沙塵暴。 /// Cerberus overlords use incandescent energy beacons to pinpoint positioning even in low-visibility conditions, like the dust storms and fog banks common on Tyrador IX.
Skin/Info/OverlordWebby=王蟲負責操控蟲族的低階物種。由於牠們之間的聯繫從不間斷，因此利維坦群落的王蟲身上，會浮現出受牠們操控的蟲族基因突變特徵。 /// Overlords exert control over the minions of the zerg. As a result of their constant connection, the Leviathan Brood's overlords reflect the genetic mutations of the creatures beneath them.
Skin/Info/OverlordXPR=由於王蟲需要同時支援不同的蟲族品系，因此有時候會在牠們身上看到為順應需求而做出的自發性突變，以增進自身的工作效率。 /// Due to their need to support many different strains of zerg at once, overlords can sometimes exhibit spontaneous adaptive mutations in an attempt to improve their own efficiency.
Skin/Info/Overseer=監察王蟲是從王蟲進化而成，主要工作是進行偵查，以及四處探測可能隱藏起來的敵人。 /// Evolved from the overlord, the overseer focuses its eyes towards scouting and revealing the presence of hidden enemies, wherever they may lurk.
Skin/Info/OverseerMecha=王蟲眼睛的有機構造無法完整複製出來，於是首席工程師將其替換為可以取代大部分功能的偵測器，唯一不能取代的是有機構造之美。 /// Unable to fully replicate the organic structure behind the overseer's eyes, the head engineer replaced them with detection sensors that fulfill largely the same purpose—aside from the aesthetics. 
Skin/Info/OverseerPrimal=監察王蟲在原生蟲族中是相當稀有的物種，非常少見。和蟲群中的同類一樣，原生監察王蟲是從原生王蟲演化而來，擁有特別敏銳的感官。 /// One of the rarest species of primal zerg, the overseers are seldom seen. Like their Swarm counterparts, they evolved from primal overlords and possess especially keen senses.
Skin/Info/OverseerRCZ=地獄犬監察王蟲的偵測技術，是由魯道福‧薩索里安博士所開發完成。它可以替半徑20公里以內的所有匿蹤目標進行精確的三角定位。 /// The Cerberus overseer's void sensor technology was developed by one Dr. Rudolfo Subsourian. It can triangulate the exact position of a cloaking effect within 20 kilometers.
Skin/Info/Phoenix=鳳凰戰機主要是作為空戰騷擾之用，以高速與迴避能力而著稱。就算敵方有數量優勢，也能藉由暫時讓敵人無法行動來與之抗衡。 /// Designed for aerial harassment, phoenixes are known for their unmatched speed and maneuverability. A single strike force can keep an enemy army pinned down even when vastly outnumbered.
Skin/Info/PhoenixGolden=席拉克部族使用的鳳凰戰機，與早期仲裁者偏好使用的護衛機相當類似。儘管有些人覺得那是充滿爭議的象徵，但也有其他人讚嘆其美麗的工藝。 /// The Shelak tribe has commissioned phoenixes that resemble the escort ships favored by early judicators. Though some see them as controversial symbols, others praise the beautiful craftsmanship.
Skin/Info/PhoenixIhanrii=儘管伊翰利鳳凰戰機的石質構造，沒有賦予它更好的操縱性和更高的速度。但在迫降的時候，就能展現出這材質堅固的特性了。 /// Though the Ihan-rii phoenix's stone construction doesn't inhibit its maneuverability or top speed, it does make it a more formidable missile when crash-landing.
Skin/Info/PhoenixPurifier=淨化者不需要使用幻影戰機的相位科技，他們會部署機械化的鳳凰戰機進行防空任務。 /// When the Purifiers do not need the phasing technology of the mirages, they will deploy robotic phoenixes to defend their skies.
Skin/Info/PhoenixTaldarim=塔達力姆重視壓倒性的威力，但是他們也明白快速又致命的武器價值何在，因此他們有好好保養從聖堂武士那邊偷來的大批鳳凰戰機。 /// There is a time for overwhelming force, and a time to be swift and deadly. The Tal'darim recognize the value in the latter, which is why they maintain a fleet of phoenixes stolen from the Templar.
Skin/Info/PhotonCannon=神族相位工匠可以把他們的防禦性建築加上強大的反物質加農砲，以及先進的偵測方式。但將躍傳科技整合進光子加農砲的實驗則大多失敗了 /// Protoss phase-smiths can outfit their defensive structures with powerful antimatter cannons and advanced detection measures. Experiments integrating photon cannons with warp technology widely ended in failure.
Skin/Info/PhotonCannonForged=即使塔達利姆承諾要遵守嚴格的戰士教條，但這並不影響他們秘密建造光子加農砲，並在敵人的礦區降下毀滅之雨的行為。 /// Despite their commitment to a rigid warrior code, the Tal'darim have no problem building photon cannons in secret to rain devastation on their enemies' mineral lines. 
Skin/Info/PhotonCannonIhanrii=伊翰利光子加農砲配備的相位阻斷器，具有獨特的翼型特徵，其設計靈感來自於原先稱霸泰拉朵九號星天空的雄偉猛禽，這種生物後來被早期的人類移民撲殺殆盡。 /// The phase disruptor housing of the Ihan-rii photon cannon features a distinctive wing-shape inspired by a majestic avian creature that once ruled Tyrador IX's skies, at least until it was hunted to extinction by early terran settlers.
Skin/Info/PhotonCannonTaldarim=
Skin/Info/PlanetaryFortressCovertOps=最新的行星要塞配備了強大的火力，錨爪也因此必須要深入地下三倍的距離，才能避免每次開火時要塞都因此滑動。
Skin/Info/Probe=探測機是卡萊工匠設計用來構築神族殖民地的核心無人機，在能量方面能夠自給自足，並且能夠啟動躍傳程序，把已經預先組建完成的重要建築傳送到指定地點。 /// Designed by the Khalai to lay the foundation for protoss settlements, probes are self-sufficient drones that can enable and initiate the warp-in of critical prefabricated structures.
Skin/Info/ProbeBlizzcon17=有群專門撿拾可用資源的人，在被摧毀的神族殖民地中，回收這些探測機，然後再以人類的工程技術和零件來改裝。運用在它們身上的，可是一種獨特的技術。 /// These probes were salvaged from a destroyed protoss colony by members of a junker gang, who then retrofitted them with terran engines and accessories. If nothing else, their craftsmanship is unique.
Skin/Info/ProbeGolden=有一些探測機活到了衝突紀元之後。在當時即使是最簡單的神族機械，也有精緻而奢華的外觀。 /// A small number of probes have survived since the period following the Aeon of Strife, where even the simplest of protoss robotics had a refined and luxurious appearance.
Skin/Info/ProbeIhanrii=伊翰利探測機在太空深處長期休眠時，會變形為立方體方便收納。 /// When not in use during long periods of deep-space hibernation, Ihan-rii probes fold into perfect cubes for compact storage.
Skin/Info/ProbePurifier=探測機是效率與勤勉的最佳模範。它們以增強的協定運作，與淨化者資料網路完整整合在一起。 /// These probes are models of efficiency and diligence. They operate on enhanced protocols for full integration with the Purifier data web.
Skin/Info/ProbeRemastered=來自大戰年代的探測機擁有更長的穩流飛翼。但相位工匠很快就發現，這樣的設計會在大規模的激烈戰鬥中產生麻煩。 /// Probes from the Great War era had longer stabilizer fins, but phase-smiths quickly learned that they could become a liability in the midst of a widescale, vicious battle.
Skin/Info/ProbeTaldarim=達蘭利用探測機預先標定出資源，好降低採集時對生態環境造成的影響。不過塔達力姆才不管這些。 /// Probes utilized by the Daelaam are calibrated to gather resources with as little ecological impact as possible. The Tal'darim have no use for such precautions.
Skin/Info/Pylon=對達蘭神族來說，重建家園的首要工作就是建立全新的幽能矩陣。每座水晶塔當中所含的凱達林水晶，讓神族能妥善運用矩陣的能量。 /// Forging a new psionic matrix has been vital to the Daelaam's reconstruction efforts. The khaydarin crystal within each pylon allows the protoss to tap into the matrix's energy.
Skin/Info/PylonForged=每個塔達利姆水晶塔都充滿幽能，足以供應16個傳送門所需的能量。 /// Each Tal'darim pylon crackles with enough psionic energy to power sixteen gateways.
Skin/Info/PylonIhanrii=由伊翰利神族重新開拓的泰拉朵九號星各個區域，隨處都能看見水晶塔所散發出來的空靈光芒，即使在軌道上也清晰可見。 /// Across areas of Tyrador IX recolonized by the Ihan-rii, proliferating fields of luminescent pylons produce an ethereal glow visible from orbit.
Skin/Info/PylonTaldarim=
Skin/Info/PylonXPR=科夏寇曾經是艾爾的首善之都。這座城市雄偉壯麗，華美的程度難以言喻。就連水晶塔這最簡單的建築都有著璀璨的裝飾。 /// Kor-shakal was once the crown jewel of Aiur, a city so resplendent that it defied description. Even structures as simple as its pylons were adorned in shining decorations.
Skin/Info/Queen=蟲后，是凱莉根為了守護蟲族的未來而創造出來的新種后蟲，具有獨立思考與分析的能力，在不斷進化的蟲族中擔任群落首領的角色。 /// To safeguard the future of the Swarm, Kerrigan orchestrated the creation a new breed of queens. Capable of independent thought and analysis, they serve as the hive masters of an ever-evolving Swarm.
Skin/Info/QueenMecha=華麗的后蟲是完成量產的機型中第一個失蹤的。而擬態計畫的經理們並不想讓大眾發現他們的行蹤，只能盡可能低調地調查事件始末。 /// The magnificent queen was the first completed production model to go missing. Loath to publicly reveal their activities, the Simulant Project managers investigated the matter as quietly as possible.
Skin/Info/QueenPrimal=原生族群中一切只看力量，所以相較於傳統的群落，后蟲在原生族群中的地位更加特殊，很少會大量出現。 /// Primal packs are ruled by strength alone, therefore queens occupy a much different position within them versus more traditional broods, and are rarely present in great numbers.
Skin/Info/QueenRCZ=后蟲把守著地獄犬的後方，它擁有鈦金屬鍛造刀和脊刺噴射發射器，還有連神經系統重建都無法消滅的雌性直覺。 /// Queens defend the Cerberus backline with forged titanium blades, jet-powered spine launchers, and matronly instincts even a neurological overhaul couldn't eliminate entirely. 
Skin/Info/QueenWebby=利維坦群落中，就連后蟲都兇殘無比。任何膽敢當面挑釁后蟲的愚蠢生物，很快就會被無數脊刺射穿全身。 /// Even the queens of the Leviathan Brood are incredibly vicious and hostile. Any creatures foolish enough to approach their clutch with hostile intent find themselves quickly impaled by many spines.
Skin/Info/Ravager=經過數年基因調整，從蟑螂進化而成的劫毀蟲，能夠迅速產生大量酸蝕體液，然後噴向敵人。 /// Evolved from roaches after years of genetic modification, ravagers possess the ability to quickly generate massive quantities of corrosive bile and then expel them at their foes.
Skin/Info/RavagerBone=蟲族甲殼鈣化之後會更加堅硬，成為更有效的裝甲。阿巴瑟非常喜愛這個帶有威嚇意味的外觀。 /// Calcification of zerg carapaces into a hardened shell makes for effective armor. Abathur considers the intimidation factor a welcome bonus.
Skin/Info/RavagerMecha=劫毀蟲的擬態機甲在電漿火焰容器的周圍安裝了吸熱隔板，來取代原本的尖刺。如此一來，機甲的其他部分才不會受到損害。 /// Simulant ravagers have been fitted with heat-absorbent panels instead of spikes around their plasma fire receptacles to prevent damage to the rest of the model. 
Skin/Info/RavagerPrimal=原生劫毀蟲既難以掌控又嗜血，牠們會吞食不夠強壯，無法反擊的幼體。在這樣的侵略性之下，我們很難預期這個物種能夠興盛多久。 /// Defiant and bloodthirsty, the primal ravagers will devour their own young if they are not strong enough to fight back. Given this level of aggression, it is uncertain how long their species will thrive.
Skin/Info/RavagerRCZ=地獄犬劫毀蟲背部的電漿脊刺會將牠發射的酸蝕體液加熱至高溫狀態。在泰拉朵九號星上，這些劫毀蟲把人類防禦措施打出了一個大缺口。 /// The plasma spines on the Cerberus ravager's back superheat the corrosive bile it fires. On Tyrador IX, these ravagers punched massive holes in the terran defense.
Skin/Info/RavagerWebby=完全進化後的劫毀蟲，身形巨大，外型恐怖令人不敢直視。利維坦群落的劫毀蟲全身覆滿絲網、有如夢魘，恐怖程度更甚其他群落。 /// Monstrous and towering, the fully evolved ravager is a terrifying sight to behold. The webbed nightmares deployed by the Leviathan Brood are only more so.
Skin/Info/Raven=渡鴉具備一流的偵測能力與防禦能力，可以建造砲塔、部署防禦無人機，甚至朝敵軍發射飛彈。如果這樣還不夠，跟你說，渡鴉的花費比前代機種還要便宜。 /// Invaluable for surveillance and defense, the raven can construct a turret, build a defense drone, or fire missiles at enemy forces. If this wasn't enough, it's also more cost effective than its predecessors.
Skin/Info/RavenCovertOps=這台可是自治聯盟特種部隊的引以為傲的空中單位。據說，就連位於地下兩公里的兩名凱爾莫瑞亞礦工在交談，它都能偵測到，可謂巧奪天工的設計。 /// The pride of the Dominion Special Forces, this exquisitely designed craft is rumored to be able to detect Kel-Morian miners whispering to each other two kilometers underground.
Skin/Info/RavenJunker=傭兵們通常不太使用高科技的監視用空中單位，但在生鏽的外殼和脫落的烤漆之下，這些渡鴉表現得和自治聯盟的單位一樣好。 /// Highly advanced surveillance craft aren't the most popular among mercenaries, but beneath the rust and cracking paint, these ravens are as good as any others in the Dominion.
Skin/Info/RavenSilver=正當地獄犬蟲族擊潰泰拉朵九號星的防衛者時，一架在高處的渡鴉，偵測到了一隊石製艦隊在這個星球的重力井當中。 /// As the Cerberus zerg threatened to overwhelm Tyrador IX's defenders, a high-altitude raven detected a fleet of strange stone ships in the planet's gravity well.
Skin/Info/RavenUmojan=這些渡鴉是精密科技的結晶，配備了我們所知不多的人工智慧系統，遠超過了自治聯盟工程師以往認可的水準。 /// The height of sophistication, these ravens are equipped with a little-understood artificial intelligence system that exceeds anything that Dominion engineers would ever approve.
Skin/Info/Reactor=在研究神族控制過的地區時，人類科學家有了突破性的發展，讓指揮官有能力使生產能力提高到兩倍。 /// While researching protoss containment fields, terran scientists made a breakthrough that allowed commanders to double their production capacity.
Skin/Info/ReactorCovertOps=最先進的反應爐能量輸出足以和雷神引擎匹敵，而可靠性只略微降低。 /// Cutting-edge reactors now rival the energy output of thor engines, with only marginally reduced reliability.
Skin/Info/ReactorSilver=在泰拉朵九號星五星級渡假勝地的總統套房，全都配有軍用級反應爐，以因應富有客人的複雜娛樂電子裝置和控制裝置需求。 /// Presidential suites in Tyrador IX's five-star resorts each come with their own military-grade reactor, in recognition of the complex recreational electronics and cybernetics the wealthiest guests tend to bring along.
Skin/Info/Reaper=不願意重新社會化的人，在通過訓練之後，就會成為死神。這群突擊兵具有高度攻擊性，能夠執行高風險任務，不過生存率相當低。 /// Recruits who prove resistant to resocialization are trained as Reapers. Hyper-aggressive and prone to taking risks, these shock troopers seldom survive a full tour of duty.
Skin/Info/ReaperCovertOps=在最近的一連串重組行動中，已經不再強迫死神使用危險的藥劑來提高作戰表現了。目前招募新人時，則是偏好天生不可預測性極高的人選。 /// In the wake of recent reforms, reapers are no longer forced to use dangerous stimulants to increase their performance. The recruiting process now favors candidates who are naturally unpredictable.
Skin/Info/ReaperJunker=米拉掠奪者手下從來不缺死神。他們喜歡用回收來的各式特殊護甲來凸顯自己，特別是那顆莫霍克頭。 /// There's never a shortage of reapers among Mira's Marauders. They tend to outdo themselves scrapping together their distinctive armor—particularly the mohawks.
Skin/Info/ReaperSilver=泰拉朵九號星上，有個死神為了躲開新迦南附近的沙塵暴決定繞路，卻正巧看見了地獄犬蟲族的入侵部隊。 /// On Tyrador IX, an invasion force of Cerberus zerg was spotted by a reaper taking the long way home to avoid a dust storm near New Canaan.
Skin/Info/ReaperUmojan=多年以來，尤摩捷護衛軍都能挑選出擁有適合心理素質的人選，來打造他們自己的死神部隊，而結果也相當不錯。 /// Over the course of many years, the Umojan Protectorate was able to psychologically profile enough suitable candidates to create their own Reaper Corps with surprisingly good results.
Skin/Info/Refinery=瓦斯精煉廠的設計是用來提煉原始高能瓦斯，並將其包裝在圓筒中，方便太空工程車運輸。 /// The refinery is designed to extract raw vespene gas and package it into a handy cylinder, which is easily transportable by space construction vehicles.
Skin/Info/RefineryCovertOps=特種部隊的精煉廠提煉高能瓦斯的速度和一般的機型一樣快，但噪音降低了75%。 /// The special forces refinery harvests vespene just as fast as the regulation model, but produces 75% less noise.
Skin/Info/RefinerySilver=根據泰拉朵九號星瓦斯精煉廠的報告，在遭受地獄犬攻擊後，雖然他們費盡心血進行維修，但是高能瓦斯的產量仍低於平均水準，彷彿儲存在地底的瓦斯全都轉向流到其他地方去了。 /// Despite diligent maintenance, Tyrador IX's refineries have reported lower-than-average vespene yields since the Cerberus attack, as if the underground reservoirs they tap have been diverted.
Skin/Info/Roach=刀鋒女皇當初精心挑選蟑螂這種生物，將牠們納入蟲群。牠們具有可觀的組織再生能力並且能噴出酸性毒液，使牠們不僅生存力高，也非常致命。 /// Roaches were hand-selected by the Queen of Blades for assimilation into the Swarm. Their impressive tissue regeneration and acidic venom make them resilient as well as deadly.
Skin/Info/RoachDeluxe=在札迦拉的命令之下，阿巴瑟繼續改良蟲族的基因組，要讓蟲族成為完美的生物。蟑螂與生俱來的再生能力，使牠們成為這種研究的理想對象。 /// Under Zagara's orders, Abathur has continued to manipulate the zerg genome in search of perfection. The roach's innate regenerative abilities make it the ideal candidate for such a pursuit.
Skin/Info/RoachMecha=這些機械安裝了精緻的自我修理系統來複製蟑螂強大的治療能力，同時還能對抗內部儲存的強酸所帶來的構造損害。 /// These machines have been outfitted with a sophisticated self-repair system to replicate the roach's incredible healing ability, while also combatting structural damage from its acid reserves.
Skin/Info/RoachPrimal=蟑螂是最先被吸收進澤瑞斯原生族群的物種之一。牠們發展出突變成原生火蟑螂和原生守護者的能力。 /// Roaches were among the first to be absorbed into primal packs on Zerus, where they developed the capability to mutate into primal igniters and primal guardians.
Skin/Info/RoachRCZ=地獄犬科學家使用奈米碳纖維材質來強化蟑螂那原本就很堅韌的裝甲。而為了強化牠的攻擊力，又加裝了鑄造的鈦金屬刀。 /// Cerberus scientists bulwarked the roach's already-impressive armor with a carbon fiber nanoweave. Forged titanium blades were added to aid its offensive capabilities as well.
Skin/Info/RoachWarren=生產蟑螂和劫毀蟲需要潮濕陰暗的環境。以有機生物質建造的蟑螂繁殖場，正好可以精確地複製出這種環境。 /// Generating roaches and ravagers requires humid, dark conditions. The roach warren is a perfectly constructed biological organ that replicates this environment precisely.
Skin/Info/RoachWarrenMecha=蟑螂繁殖場需要這種先進的聚合合金做為包覆材料，才能抵擋其內部產生的強酸腐蝕性。 /// Significant polymer-alloy innovations were necessary to develop a housing for the Simulant roach warren that would withstand the turmoil of its internal acid generation.
Skin/Info/RoachWarrenRCZ=像蟑螂繁殖場這種經過地獄犬改造的蟲族建築，會產生具有自我複製能力的藍圖，以此讓幼蟲成長時，能夠同步安裝遠端控制裝置。 /// Cerberus adaptations of zerg structures like the roach warren produce self-replicating blueprints for remote control equipment to be installed synchronous with larval development.
Skin/Info/RoachWebby=從贊塔蛞蝓衍生出來的蟑螂，展現出驚人的適應潛能。利維坦群落的蟑螂長期暴露在高能瓦斯中，因此更具攻擊性。 /// Much like the zantar slugs they are derived from, roaches display an incredible potential for adaptation. Vespene exposure has been known to cause those of Leviathan Brood to grow incredibly aggressive.
Skin/Info/RoboticsBay=機械研究所是重要的卡萊相位工匠最主要的研發設施。 /// The robotics bay serves as the primary research and development facility of the khalai's foremost phase-smiths.
Skin/Info/RoboticsBayForged=黑暗且不祥的機械爪飄出了一陣陣的態化氫煙霧，這就是塔達力姆機械研究所。 /// Terrazine fumes leak from the dark, ominous claw that is the Tal'darim robotics bay.
Skin/Info/RoboticsBayIhanrii=伊翰利機械研究所的分段組裝手臂能靈活地快速移動，讓人忘記這些是以石頭構成的。 /// The segmented assembly arms of the Ihan-rii robotics bay move with flexibility and speed that belie their stone composition.
Skin/Info/RoboticsFacility=相位工匠需要昂貴的設施來躍傳巨大的自走戰爭單位，譬如說巨像。 /// Phase-smiths require expansive facilities to warp in enormous war automatons, such as the colossus.
Skin/Info/RoboticsFacilityForged=厚實的裝甲外殼，加上強化的重型錨爪，讓塔達利姆機械製造廠有著嚇人的外貌。 /// An armored housing and heavy-duty, reinforced anchors give the Tal'darim robotics facility an intimidating profile.
Skin/Info/RoboticsFacilityIhanrii=當伊翰利被問及近期大量建造的機械製造廠，他們不願正面回應。這些設施不分日夜、無時無刻都在製造重型武裝單位。 /// The Ihan-rii have been evasive when questioned about the frenzied activity of their newly constructed robotics facilities, which churn out heavily armed units at all hours of the day and night.
