Skin/Info/SCV=在人類星球，建築和維修工作都交由T280太空工程車來執行。由於其多功能性質與極為可靠的工作能力，讓太空工程車成為工業方面的貴重工具。 /// The T-280 SCV is a staple of construction and repair across all terran worlds. A versatile and reliable workhorse, the Space Construction Vehicle is an invaluable industrial tool.
Skin/Info/SCVBlizzcon17=就算是專門回收可用物資的人，也需要採集晶礦或高能瓦斯。只是他們喜歡擺出威嚇他人的姿態。 /// Even junker gangs have to collect minerals and vespene gas, though they try to do so in an intimidating style.
Skin/Info/SCVCovertOps=由於秘密任務的獨特需求，就連太空工程車也都換上最新式的裝備，像是出力更強的夾子，以及新式雷射開採鉗。 /// Due to the unique demands of covert missions, even the SCVs must be outfitted with all of the latest upgrades, including a stronger utility clamp and new laser extraction claw.
Skin/Info/SCVJunker=有一部分太空工程車駕駛受不了自治聯盟的低薪高工時，選擇往傭兵的方向發展。而顯然大多數人都很滿意這個選擇。 /// Tired of low pay and long hours in the Dominion, some SCV pilots choose to go the mercenary route. It's safe to say that most of them never look back.
Skin/Info/SCVRemastered=在群落戰爭期間，T280太空工程車外觀相當不同，不僅不那麼笨重，工作夾比較小，而且據說還有隱藏式的杯架。 /// T-280 SCVs dating back before the Brood War featured a different, less bulky appearance with smaller utility clamps and, purportedly, secret cup holders.
Skin/Info/SCVSilver=泰拉朵騎士為他們的行星防禦部隊選擇護甲時，使用了鉑銥合金來盡量凸顯光澤，並且抵抗刮傷。 /// When selecting armor for their planetary defense force, the Knights of Tyrador chose a platinum-iridium alloy to maximize gleam and scratchproofing.
Skin/Info/SCVUmojan=簡單、堅固、實用。這些太空工程車配備了雷射鑽洞機，即使是最緻密的礦物，也能輕鬆劃開一道完美的刻痕。 /// Simple, sturdy, and reliable, these SCVs feature laser drills that make perfectly clean cuts on even the densest minerals.
Skin/Info/SensorTower=感應塔結合電磁學和熱學科技，加上都卜勒分析以及地震感知器，讓人員可以透過最終輸出的多重光譜分析資料，輕易地偵測到敵人。 /// Using a combination of electromagnetic and thermal technology alongside Doppler analysis and seismic sensors, the multispectrum output of these towers causes them to be easily detectable by enemies.
Skin/Info/SensorTowerCovertOps=由於一隻大蛾觸發了錯誤警報，導致一座瑪而‧薩拉貿易站因此氣化，因此，新一批的感應塔將感知能力稍微調低了一些。 /// After a false alarm triggered by an overlarge moth led to the vaporization of a Mar Sara trading post, the new line of sensor towers had its perceptive power dialed back slightly.
Skin/Info/SensorTowerSilver=在地獄犬蟲族攻擊沒多久，泰拉朵感應塔開始偵測到奇怪的震波模式，可是這些震動是起因於伊翰利神族的大規模建設工作。 /// Soon after the Cerberus zerg attacked, Tyrador sensor towers began detecting strange seismic patterns, but these were attributed to widespread Ihan-rii construction efforts.
Skin/Info/Sentry=哨衛是一種戰鬥無人機，配有力場產生器，以及全像投影裝置，在戰場上提供支援，保護數量日益減少的神族戰士。 /// Robotic combat drones outfitted with force field generators and holo-projectors, sentries were developed in order to support and protect the dwindling numbers of protoss warriors.
Skin/Info/SentryGolden=在神族機械中並沒有明顯與哨衛對應的早期版本，不過充滿想像力的相位工匠重新設計了哨衛，讓它與其他有長遠歷史的機械有一致的風格。 /// Sentries themselves have no clear predecessors within protoss robotics, but imaginative phase-smiths have redesigned them to complement other vessels with longer histories.
Skin/Info/SentryIhanrii=很久以前，伊翰利神族曾經駕馭了一種強大的薩爾納加神器，名為「星雲之井」，並用來提供哨衛能量。但如今這種神器所剩無幾。 /// Long ago, the Ihan-rii protoss harnessed volatile xel'naga artifacts known as "nebula wells" to power their sentries. Few of these artifacts remain.
Skin/Info/SentryPurifier=儘管淨化者大軍通常偏好使用強化者，但還是有哨衛會出現在他們的行列之中。這些無人駕駛的機械已經整合到淨化者的資料網路中，不需要仰賴幽能。 /// Though Purifier armies often prefer energizers, some sentries are present within their ranks. These drones have been integrated into the Purifier data web rather than relying on psionic energy.
Skin/Info/SentryTaldarim=落入塔達力姆手中的哨衛，大多被改裝成浩劫者了，僅有少數維持原本樣貌。因此產生多種不同的機械支援單位，卻也造成部隊編制上的困擾。 /// While most sentries seized by the Tal'darim are refitted into havocs, some are left mostly unchanged. This results in a varied array of robotic support and a certain degree of misdirection.
Skin/Info/ShieldBattery=由於護盾恢復科技的進展，護盾充能器在群落戰爭期間遭到大量棄用...。但在改善生產率以及容量之後，某些陣營開始重新運用這項科技。 /// Shield batteries were largely abandoned in the wake of the Brood War due to advancements in shield regeneration. After improvements were made to its throughput and capacity, some factions reintegrated the technology.
Skin/Info/ShieldBatteryForged=儘管塔達利姆可以使用護盾充能器，但他們基本上還是會將資源投資在更具侵略性的目標上。 /// Though the Tal'darim have access to shield batteries, they typically prefer to invest their resources in more aggressive pursuits.
Skin/Info/ShieldBatteryIhanrii=伊翰利神族為了將自己建設大量護盾充能器防禦網路和強大常備軍的行為合理化，他們提出的理由是「為防禦不受控制的野生生物攻擊行為」。 /// To justify their construction of a vast shield battery defense network and a powerful standing army, the Ihan-rii cite "defense against unruly wildlife."
Skin/Info/SiegeTank=機動性較強的庫希歐攻城坦克是弧光攻城坦克的後繼機，在泛用性和威力方面都更為優秀。戰地指揮官說這型坦克攻守皆備。 /// A modern replacement for the aging Arclite model, Crucio siege tanks are both versatile and heavy hitting. Battlefield commanders swear by them for both offense and defense.
Skin/Info/SiegeTankCovertOps=雖然庫希歐攻城坦克是廣大自治聯盟指揮官愛用的單位，不過這種坦克已經沒有改良空間了。強化裝甲和威力強大的加農砲讓這型坦克的作戰效率更加傑出。 /// Though the Crucio has long been popular among the Dominion commanders, it was not without room for improvement. Reinforced plating and heftier cannons make this version even more formidable.
Skin/Info/SiegeTankJunker=這些可怕的坦克經過大量改造，已經和原本的庫希歐攻城坦克完全不一樣了。它們在有突發的破壞需求時，表現得比原始型號好多了。 /// These beastly tanks are so heavily modified that they hardly resemble their original Crucio models. They fare much better than their predecessors when it comes to impromptu demolition matches.
Skin/Info/SiegeTankMerc=人類傭兵不斷在調整他們的機械載具，例如讓引擎最佳化來提高速度，加強控制介面的多功能性，或是以外觀塗裝來威嚇敵人。 /// Terran mercenaries can always find ways to customize their vehicles, whether it's adding speed through engine optimization, versatility in control configurations, or cosmetic changes to intimidate enemies. 
Skin/Info/SiegeTankSilver=高層重要人士來訪泰拉朵時，一隊外觀完美無瑕的鉑合金攻城坦克會連發十響禮炮，迎接他們到來。 /// Dignitaries above a certain rank are greeted upon their arrival in Tyrador with a ten-round salute from a company of spotless platinum-alloy siege tanks. 
Skin/Info/SiegeTankUmojan=尤摩捷帝國坦克是最近才開發出來的產品，但它在早期的戰鬥測試中已經打敗了自治聯盟的對應單位，而這正是他們的目的。 /// Umojan Imperio tanks are a recent invention that has already rivaled their Dominion counterparts in early combat tests—which was precisely their goal.
Skin/Info/SpawningPool=孵化池的大型腔室是用來存放異化蟲之外的突變種品系的，包括無法飛行的后蟲。 /// The spawning pool's large chambers have grown to house the genetic mutations for organisms other than the zergling, including a flightless variant of the queen.
Skin/Info/SpawningPoolMecha=聚合物鈦金屬複合材料讓擬態機甲孵化池擁有可彎曲性，並且使其能夠儲存孵化池所需的揮發性黏液。 /// Polymer-titanium composites allow the Simulant spawning pool to flex and conform to the volatile ooze it contains.
Skin/Info/SpawningPoolRCZ=相較原本的純生物控制機制，機械控制強化器能夠更加精準地讓地獄犬孵化池的溫度和酸鹼度維持在一定範圍內。 /// Cybernetic enhancements keep Cerberus spawning pools in temperature and pH ranges considerably more precise than their pure-biological antecedents.
Skin/Info/SpineCrawler=在群落戰爭之後，蟲群製造出了脊刺爬行蟲，可以協助蟲群對抗來自地面的威脅。它們可以在戰場上移動位置，取得控制區域的優勢。 /// Following the Brood War, the swarm generated spine crawlers to better protect itself from ground threats. They are capable of repositioning around the battlefield to gain area control.
Skin/Info/SpineCrawlerMecha=擬態機甲脊刺爬行蟲擁有單分子尺度的脊刺尖端，讓脊刺爬行蟲有辦法刺穿最厚的人類裝甲。 /// A spearpoint terminating in a monomolecular tip allows the Simulant spine crawler to penetrate even the thickest terran armor. 
Skin/Info/SpineCrawlerRCZ=地獄犬安排了數千隻遠端控制的脊刺爬行蟲深入泰拉朵九號星地殼中，以擴展錯綜複雜的熔岩通道網路。 /// Cerberus has tasked thousands of remote-control spine crawlers with expanding the lava tube networks that criss-cross Tyrador IX's crust.
Skin/Info/Spire=尖嘯螳螂高聳的巢穴是蟲族螺旋塔的基礎，其底部是由具彈性的肌肉組織構成。 /// The towering nests of the mantis screamers formed the basis for the zerg spire. The stalks that form their foundation are made of flexible muscle.
Skin/Info/SpireMecha=供應擬態機甲飛螳和腐化飛蟲的推進氣體庫存，讓螺旋塔不斷與它的限制用纜線拉扯擺動。 /// A reservoir of propellant gases for Simulant mutalisks and corruptors keeps the spire bobbing against its restraint cables.
Skin/Info/SpireRCZ=地底的地獄犬螺旋塔所孵化出的飛螳，從泰拉朵巨蝠學會利用回聲定位進行狩獵的能力，一舉取代巨蝠，成為這顆星球最恐怖的穴居生物。 /// Mutalisks from subterranean Cerberus spires exhibit echolocative hunting behavior absorbed from Tyrador gigabats, previously the planet's scariest cave-dwelling creature.
Skin/Info/SporeCrawler=光是孢子殖穴還不足以保障主宰的生存，為了保護自己的物種，蟲族進化出了空中防禦，製造出適用更多場合的孢子爬行蟲。 /// Spore colonies were not enough to prevent the Overmind's elimination. In order to protect their species, zerg evolved their air defense, creating the more flexible spore crawler.
Skin/Info/SporeCrawlerMecha=第一位發現擬態機甲孢子爬行蟲的假彈藥被替換成奈米仿真物質的人類飛行員，獲得了一大筆退休金，和一副純金打造的義肢。 /// The first terran pilot to discover that the Simulant spore crawler's fake ammunition had been replaced by a nano-facsimile of the real thing was awarded a generous pension and gold-plated replacement legs.
Skin/Info/SporeCrawlerRCZ=地獄犬孢子爬行蟲聚集在泰拉朵九號星地表的洞窟中，看起來就像是一大片脈動的多刺石筍。 /// Cerberus spore crawlers amass in caverns near Tyrador IX's surface like great fields of pulsing, spiny stalagmites.
Skin/Info/Stalker=追獵者是由尼拉辛姆所創，並且在當中注入了原本戰士的暗影原質。他們的瞬移本事，使他們行動迅速又難以捉摸。 /// Created by the Nerazim, stalkers are machines that are infused with the shadow essences of their warriors. The ability to teleport makes them both swift and unpredictable.
Skin/Info/StalkerDeluxe=尼拉辛姆的追獵者科技受惠於卡萊工程科學，神族現在正試著將龍騎士機甲的強化部件整合到追獵者的框架當中。 /// The Nerazim's stalker technology has benefited from Khalai engineering. The protoss are now experimenting with integrating dragoon chassis reinforcements into the battle strider frame. 
Skin/Info/StalkerGolden=卡萊相位工匠試圖以古代聖堂武士的風格，重新打造出尼拉辛姆的追獵者。可惜最終招來了許多批評，而非景仰。 /// Khalai phase-smiths have attempted to recreate Nerazim's stalkers in the elegant style of the ancient Templar. Unfortunately, their results elicited more offense than admiration.
Skin/Info/StalkerIhanrii=追獵者身上雕銘著神聖的符文，可以用來保護他們的可動石質裝甲，抵抗伊翰利神族敵人的攻擊。 /// These stalkers are inscribed with sacred runes meant to safeguard their animated stone armor against the heretic enemies of the Ihan-rii. 
Skin/Info/StalkerPurifier=進化者進一步改善了追獵者的程式，讓它有能力全自動地從複雜的互動戰鬥紀錄中取得資料，進而改善表現。 /// The Purifiers have further refined stalker programming to draw from a complex log of battle interactions, allowing them to perform well even though they are fully automated.
Skin/Info/StalkerTaldarim=並不是每個塔達力姆神族都希望成為飛升者。那些只想琢磨自己的戰鬥技巧，好好為大領主效勞的人，往往會化身追獵者，專心狩獵敵人。 /// Not all Tal'darim seek ascension. Those who wish only to sharpen their combat skills and serve their Highlord often choose to become stalkers, in order to better hunt and kill their foes.
Skin/Info/Stargate=躍傳主力艦的過程需要耗用大量能量，導致過程中放射出的大量光線，在極遠的距離外就能觀測得到。 /// The process of warping in capital ships requires such a vast amount of energy that the excess light emission can be witnessed from vast distances.
Skin/Info/StargateForged=塔達利姆星際之門延長的建築結構可以協助剛召喚來的船艦加速離開，直接投入戰鬥。 /// The elongated structure of the Tal'darim stargate helps newly summoned ships accelerate out of the bay and directly into battle.
Skin/Info/StargateIhanrii=雖然伊翰利宣稱他們很滿意居住在古老家園的生活，不過他們的星際之門卻開始製造可穿梭星際的主力艦種，暗示著某種追求權力的動機。 /// Though the Ihan-rii claim to be satisfied with partial inhabitation of their ancestral homeworld, their stargates have begun to produce interstellar capital ships, which would suggest somewhat more imperial motives.

Skin/Info/Starport=自治聯盟陸戰隊作戰手冊中明白指出，空軍優勢是人類在克普魯以及其他星區取得主導地位的關鍵。 /// The Dominion Marine Corps combat handbook makes very clear that air superiority is vital to terran dominance in the Koprulu sector and beyond. 
Skin/Info/StarportCovertOps=每次任務完成之後，特種部隊星際港會將成員與貨物運送到星軌上，就和一座功能齊全的太空站一樣。 /// After each mission is complete, the special forces starport carries its crew and cargo into orbit, where it functions as a fully operational space station.
Skin/Info/StarportSilver=為了因應大量激增的外星威脅，泰拉朵騎士加速進行星際港生產計畫，可是伊翰利似乎也同時跟進，加快擴增空軍規模的腳步。 /// Proliferating extraplanetary threats have led the Knights of Tyrador to accelerate their starport production schedules, but the Ihan-rii seem to be amassing air units just as quickly.
Skin/Info/SupplyDepot=稱職的指揮官一定相當明白補給線的重要性。少了堆滿糧食與彈藥的補給站，根本不可能打仗。 /// Every CO worth their salt knows the importance of a supply line. Without a depot fully stocked with food and ammo, warfare is simply impossible.
Skin/Info/SupplyDepotCovertOps=在比較炎熱的行星上，這種補給站的超強通風系統讓下哨的陸戰隊們紛紛到這裡來享受清涼飲料。 /// On hotter planets, this supply depot's supercharged ventilation system makes it a popular spot for off-duty marines to crack open a few cold ones.
Skin/Info/SupplyDepotSilver=泰拉朵騎士補給站頂部的獨角獸印記，每天會以手工打磨兩次，通常是由新人或是最低階的士兵來做。 /// The unicorn sigil atop each Knights of Tyrador supply depot is hand-polished twice daily, usually by the freshest and lowest-ranking recruits.
Skin/Info/SupplyDepotXPR=安捷爾物流在經過失去繼承人的這場悲劇之後，再度恢復了營運。這家公司保證會以優惠的價格，並在預定時間內將貨物運抵前線。 /// After the tragic loss of its heir apparent, Angel Shipping is back in business. The company's shipments are guaranteed to arrive on the frontline ahead of schedule and under budget.
Skin/Info/SwarmHost=蟲族的增殖能力相當強，其中以百生獸最為優秀。憑藉著快速孵化一群又一群蝗蟲，讓百生獸具有以一擋百的戰力。 /// The Swarm excels at proliferation, especially the hideous Swarm Host. By rapidly birthing multitudes of locusts, a single Swarm Host can overwhelm an enemy army.
Skin/Info/SwarmHostMecha=在研究百生獸機械運作機制時，工程師開始一個個生病倒下，但安全系統卻沒有回報任何問題，生產也沒有受到任何干擾，除了幾個致命的案例以外。 /// Engineers began to fall ill while working on the swarm host mechanics. However, the safety systems did not report a problem, and production continued undisturbed—fatalities aside.
Skin/Info/SwarmHostPrimal=原生百生獸是所有百生獸的祖先，百生獸僅僅只是其中一個旁支物種。但在命運的擺弄之下，這兩個品系再度合而為一。 /// These creatures have developed as an offshoot of the primal hosts, who were the progenitors of all swarm hosts. Now, through a surprising twist of fate, the strains have merged once more.
Skin/Info/SwarmHostRCZ=地獄犬百生獸內部有微型產線，讓每隻蝗蟲都配有可遠端遙控的頭部裝置。 /// The Cerberus swarm host contains an internal microfactory that equips each locust with remote-control headgear.
Skin/Info/SwarmHostWebby=利維坦群落的百生獸特別擅長兩棲作戰，牠們身上具有許多基因優勢，因此能迅速通過水域，獵殺牠們的獵物。 /// The swarm hosts of the Leviathan Brood are uniquely specialized for amphibious assault and bear many genetic advantages that allow them to move quickly through the oceans and assail their prey.
Skin/Info/TechLab=一旦戰鬥用建築建造完成，就能在旁邊成立科技實驗室進行研發工作。其中某些研發工作相當危險，但對戰事相當重要。 /// Once combat buildings are established, small tech labs are built alongside them to undertake research and development work. Some of this work can be dangerous, but it is seen essential to the war effort.
Skin/Info/TechLabCovertOps=特種部隊的科技實驗室使用從自治聯盟神族盟友偷來的奈米科技，將能源使用效率最大化，提升研發速度。 /// The special forces tech lab uses nanotechnology pilfered from the Dominion's protoss allies to maximize energy efficiency and research speed.
Skin/Info/TechLabSilver=泰拉朵騎士科技實驗室擁有最先進的氣候控制系統，可以透過行星的激烈溫度變動來把效率維持在尖峰狀態。 /// Knights of Tyrador tech labs feature state-of-the-art climate control systems to maintain peak efficiency through the planet's intense shifts in temperature.
Skin/Info/Tempest=暴風艦加入黃金艦隊建制的時間不算長，但是已經贏得威力最強戰艦的美名。面對它們射出的猛烈崩解能量，沒人能掉以輕心。 /// Tempests are a recent addition to the Golden Armada, and have earned their place as one of the fleet’s most powerful warships. Their volatile disintegration weaponry is a force to be reckoned with.
Skin/Info/TempestGolden=在數次實驗之後，相位工匠終於打造出了獨特的暴風艦，裝飾著閃耀的合金板。這些合金板可以承受船艦動能矩陣的破壞性傷害。 /// After some experimentation, phase-smiths created customized tempests with high-sheen ornamental plating that could withstand the destructive energies of the vessel's kinetic matrix.
Skin/Info/TempestIhanrii=伊翰利暴風艦石質表面的抑制效果，反而提升了動能矩陣集中能量輸出的功率。 /// The dampening effect of the Ihan-rii tempest's stone surface enhances its ability to focus the incredible power output of its kinetic matrix.
Skin/Info/TempestPurifier=這些遠端操作的船艦是淨化者計畫最具代表性的成就。賽博洛斯所製造的合金板更讓它在同型船艦中顯得十分搶眼。 /// This remotely piloted vessel is one of the signature achievements of the Purifier program, and its Cybros manufactured plating is among the most distinctive of its kind.
Skin/Info/TempestTaldarim=雖然這是少數案例，不過達蘭還是有讓塔達力姆感到驚艷的地方，例如暴風艦就是一個例子。大領主第一次見識到暴風艦的實戰表現，就發誓一定要把它們納入死亡艦隊。 /// Occasionally, the Daelaam impress the Tal'darim. The creation of the tempest was one such moment. Upon first seeing them in combat, the Highlord vowed to seize them for the death fleet.
Skin/Info/TemplarArchive=高階聖堂武士會在聖堂文庫存取並研究前人的記憶與經驗，磨練自身的幽能能力。 /// The high templar hone their psionic abilities at the templar archives by accessing and studying the memories and experiences of their predecessors.
Skin/Info/TemplarArchiveForged=在戰事之間，飛升之鍊階級較高的塔達利姆戰士可以進入聖堂文庫，重新體驗他們最英勇的事蹟。 /// In between battles, Tal'darim warriors ranked highly on the Chain of Ascension can visit the templar archives to relive their most heroic feats.
Skin/Info/TemplarArchiveIhanrii=伊翰利聖堂文庫嚴密收藏著文明相關的秘密，例如宗教文獻，或是關於恐怖的半有機體可動石材之操作指南。 /// Ihan-rii templar archives contain the civilization's most closely guarded secrets, including religious texts and instructions for the gruesome semi-organic generation of animated stone.
Skin/Info/Thor=雷神展現了人類的極致軍事力量，在一台機體上就裝備了足夠解決敵方一整支戰鬥部隊的火力。 /// The ultimate expression of terran military might, the Thor is outfitted with enough artillery to take down an army of enemy combatants on its own.
Skin/Info/ThorCE=改造與強化雷神已經成為自治聯盟工程師們的一場地下競賽。而對於可以不斷增強這架攻城雙足兵器，領導者們也相當滿意，允許這股風潮持續下去。 /// Improving on the Thor has become an informal competition amongst Dominion engineers. Top brass is content with allowing this trend to continue, as long as it results in more powerful siege walkers.
Skin/Info/ThorCovertOps=自治聯盟特種部隊的雷神身上不光是進行過無數改良，還加裝了最新型的生化鋼鐵裝甲，可說是近代武器工程方面的重大成果。 /// A signature achievement in recent weapons engineering, the Dominion Special Forces thor boasts innumerable upgrades and the latest in neosteel plating advancements.
Skin/Info/ThorJunker=米拉的手下們早就想要一台雷神了，但製造上的困難總會讓他們打退堂鼓。不過相信他們很快就能找到方法，組裝出一台有完整功能的雷神了… /// Mira's crew has long desired a Thor of their own, but construction challenges routinely set them back. Any day now, they could find a way to assemble one that is fully functional...
Skin/Info/ThorSilver=泰拉朵的雷神經過鈽塗層處理，可以使動能在閥值以下的投射物彈道偏折，而且鈽處理在閱兵的時候也相當美觀。 /// Tyrador thors are treated with a plutonium coating that deflects projectiles below a certain energy threshold. They also look great in parades.
Skin/Info/ThorUmojan=在經過數年狂熱的探索之後，尤摩捷護衛軍終於找到對抗自治聯盟雷神的解答。它令人印象深刻的程度，就和它身上尤摩捷符號的數量一樣，讓人驚嘆。 /// After years of fervent exploration, the Umojan Protectorate has finally come up with its answer to the Dominion's Thor, and its impressiveness is only matched by the number of Umojan symbols it sports.
Skin/Info/TwilightCouncil=暮光議會是達蘭神族代表舉行會議，討論神族將來如何改善的所在地。 /// The twilight council serves as a meeting place for representatives of the Daelaam to discuss the betterment of all protoss.
Skin/Info/TwilightCouncilForged=這又是一座偷來的卡萊建築物，只是塔達利姆暮光議會的外觀更加陰沉嚇人，不過它所提供的升級選項完全相同。 /// Another stolen Khalai structure, the Tal'darim twilight council's architecture is more intimidating and somber, though the upgrades it bestows are identical.
Skin/Info/TwilightCouncilIhanrii=伊翰利議會高層發現，返回阿拉基爾這個古老家園，帶來一種既熟悉又不安的感覺。離開家園這段時間太久了，許多事物都跟以前不一樣了，例如空氣品質變差，以及他們喜愛的數個物種已經滅絕，這兩者皆肇因於人類在此地發展。 /// Ihan-rii council elders have found the return to their homeworld, Arakyr, both familiar and unsettling. Much has changed in their long absence, including a decline in air quality and the extinction of several beloved species, both attributable to terran development.
Skin/Info/Ultralisk=雷獸擁有難以置信的體型和力量。牠們那裝甲等級的蟲殼幾乎無法穿透，而那對巨大的鐮刃能輕易地將敵人碾碎或切成兩半。 /// Ultralisks are legendary for their size and strength. Their armored carapaces are nearly impenetrable, and their gargantuan pincers can both crush and eviscerate their enemies with ease.
Skin/Info/UltraliskCE=雷獸原本就巨大且破壞力驚人。在注入了澤瑞斯星原生蟲族的原質之後，牠們又更成為了名符其實的殺戮機器。 /// Ultralisks are powerful and destructive enough as they are. When infused with the essence of Zerus's primal zerg, however, they become truly unstoppable killing machines.
Skin/Info/UltraliskCavern=這個洞穴存放了許多帶有輻射的危險生物質。其中產生的化學反應會用來製造雷獸所需的基因編碼。 /// This cavern is filled with dangerous biological deposits infused with high radiation. The chemical reactions created within are used to build the genetic code required for the ultralisk.
Skin/Info/UltraliskCavernMecha=擬態機甲雷獸洞穴利用改造過的戰巡艦熱能護盾，來存放具有放射性的內部構造。 /// The Simulant Project ultralisk cavern houses its radioactive innards within a converted battlecruiser engine heatshield.
Skin/Info/UltraliskCavernRCZ=雷獸洞穴每小時能製造出三組閃亮亮的鈦合金刀刃，威力十分驚人。稍微美中不足的地方，正如地獄犬副總裁某次諷刺地說道，雷獸嘴巴上方的燈看起來像是滑稽的小眼睛。 /// This ultralisk cavern churns out three sets of gleaming forged-titanium blades every hour, an intimidating purpose only slightly undermined by the fact that--as a Cerberus vice president once wryly observed--the lights above its mouth look like goofy little eyes.
Skin/Info/UltraliskMecha=在計畫早期，大家都同意團隊不會試圖複製雷獸。但後來實驗室的狀況一片混亂，顯然這個協議已經不存在了… /// Early in the project, it was agreed that the team would never construct a replica of the ultralisk. When chaos later overtook the lab, it became clear that the agreement had been broken...
Skin/Info/UltraliskPrimal=原生雷獸的外觀有很高的變異性，有些和蟲群的雷獸相當類似，另一些有著不同特徵的雷獸則很能適應澤瑞斯的生活。 /// Primal ultralisks exhibit a high level of variety in their appearance, with some closely resembling the Swarm ultralisks, and others adapting different features better suited to life on Zerus.
Skin/Info/UltraliskRCZ=地獄犬業務團隊總是會對有潛力的客戶展示如何遠端遙控雷獸。牠們的熱處理鈦金屬刀更是一大看點。 /// Cerberus sales teams always make sure to show prospective clients the remote-control ultralisk. Their heat-treated titanium blade implants are a beautiful sight to behold.
Skin/Info/UltraliskRemastered=相較於現代雷獸的厚重裝甲，以前的雷獸比較輕巧敏捷，強大的肌肉和肌腱可以一次屠殺一片敵人。 /// Early ultralisks were slimmer and more agile than their modern-day counterparts, with swaths of durable muscle and sinew instead of bulky armor.
Skin/Info/UltraliskWebby=幾乎沒有什麼生物能跟雷獸的怪力相抗衡。利維坦群落的雷獸身上長出脊刺和骨刃，如此恐怖的外型可說是一代傳奇。 /// Few other living creatures can match the sheer might of the ultralisks. Those birthed by the Leviathan Brood are terrifying visages of spines and blades--monsters worthy of legend.
Skin/Info/Viking=維京戰機的設計理念，是用來強化泰倫自治聯盟的對空武力；具有兩種變形模式，可說是相當優秀的現代戰機。 /// Developed to bolster the Terran Dominion's anti-air forces, the Viking is a modern classic thanks to its two versatile combat modes.
Skin/Info/VikingCovertOps=自治聯盟的研究人員發現，在維京戰機上面加裝一組雙引擎，就能同時強化戰機在兩種模式下的火力。 /// Dominion researchers have added a new set of twin engines to complement the existing design of the viking, while increasing its firepower in both modes.
Skin/Info/VikingJunker=米拉的技師幫維京戰機加上了一系列特殊改裝，包括一組巨大的雙引擎，它在全速運轉下發出的怒吼聲，對敵人有強大的威嚇力。 /// Mira's mechanics have given their Vikings a number of special additions, including massive twin engines that produce an impressively intimidating roar when fully revved.
Skin/Info/VikingMecha=在維勒安大帝的指示下，城堡工業在維京戰機技術面有大幅突破。設計出的原型機具有更加流線的外型，效率也更高。 /// Under Emperor Valerian's orders, Castillo Industries has developed a breakthrough in Viking technology. Their prototype features a sleeker and more efficient construction.
Skin/Info/VikingSilver=維京戰機藍色的推進器在夜空中十分搶眼，甚至在數哩外就能看見。遊客們也因此能確保泰拉朵騎士正在看顧他們。 /// At night, the stunning blue thrusters on this viking can be spotted from miles away, reassuring tourists that the Knights of Tyrador are watching over them.
Skin/Info/VikingUmojan=在長時間的協商之後，城堡工業終於同意為尤摩捷護衛軍獨家生產全新，配備有重裝甲的維京戰機。 /// After a protracted negotiation, Castillo Industries has agreed to manufacture a new, heavily plated Viking model exclusively for the Umojan Protectorate.
Skin/Info/Viper=阿巴瑟將原生蟲族的飛蟒基因序編入蟲族基因庫，飛蟒能隨主人的意思，任意操弄戰場。 /// Originally a part of the primal zerg, the vipers' sequences were incorporated into the Swarm by Abathur himself. Now, they serve as a tool to manipulate the battlefield to their master's liking.
Skin/Info/ViperMecha=當擬態計畫接近完成時，計畫總監開始特別注意他們打造出的成品，以及成本。而就在這個時候，計畫的主辦人開始拒絕回答任何問題。 /// As the Simulant Project neared its completion, the directors became increasingly concerned about what they had created—and at what cost. The project owners stopped answering questions around this point.
Skin/Info/ViperPrimal=飛蟒的原始樣本就已經具備了許多難纏的防禦能力，而這也讓阿巴瑟注意到牠，以牠做為蟲群進一步演化的首選。 /// The original viper specimens possess a number of uniquely vicious defenses, making it no surprise that they came to Abathur's attention as prime candidates for further evolution.
Skin/Info/ViperRCZ=植入了髻狀顱內移植物的飛蟒，在抓握物體上的準確性大幅提升。 /// Vipers with hammerhead cranial implants demonstrate dramatic increases in prehensile proboscis precision.
Skin/Info/ViperWebby=利維坦群落可說是最古老的蟲族群落之一。與蟲族的其他物種相比，牠們的飛蟒呈現出更多破壞蠍的特徵。雖然這讓牠們的外型看起來十分奇形怪狀，但好處是體內可儲存強烈的劇毒。 /// As one of the original zerg broods, Leviathan vipers exhibit more defiler tendencies than the rest of the Swarm. While this has caused many abnormalities to surface, its potent toxins appear to be worth it.
Skin/Info/VoidRay=聖堂武士和尼拉辛姆科技的結合，造就出虛空艦，這種極具破壞力的攻擊艦，正是兩個陣營攜手合作的證明。 /// The result of combining Templar and Nerazim technology, void rays are devastating assault ships that demonstrate what is possible when the two factions unite for a common cause.
Skin/Info/VoidRayGolden=最新的虛空艦結合了古老聖堂武士的經典架構，以及尼拉辛姆偏好的陰影色彩風格。 /// The latest void rays have combined the classical refinement of ancient Templar construction with the shadowy coloration favored by the Nerazim.
Skin/Info/VoidRayIhanrii=在泰拉朵九號星上，一支石製艦隊帶著轟鳴的虛空能量光束出現，讓淹沒新迦南防禦設施的地獄犬蟲族頓時無處可逃。 /// On Tyrador IX, a fleet of stone ships with shrieking void-energy beams appeared and blindsided the Cerberus zerg just as they overran New Canaan's defenses. 
Skin/Info/VoidRayPurifier=淨化者的虛空艦是工藝的結晶。在這艘船艦上，結合了三個不同神族陣營的研究成果。 /// The Purifier void ray is a true feat in engineering, combining the research of three different protoss factions in a single elegant vessel.
Skin/Info/VoidRayTaldarim=血岩晶體取得不易。如果塔達力姆的晶體存量不足以把虛空艦改裝成毀滅者，他們會毫不猶豫的直接利用在虛空艦本身的武裝。 /// Bloodshard crystals are not easily collected. When the Tal'darim do not have enough of them to convert a void ray into a destroyer, they make use of the ship's existing armaments without hesitation.
Skin/Info/WarpPrism=傳輸稜鏡能作為幽能矩陣的延長線，不只是具備機動性的兵力運輸工具，同時也是緊急時的能量供給裝置。雖然本身脆弱不耐攻擊，但是對神族艦隊來說，它們是不可或缺的存在。 /// By acting as a conduit into the psionic matrix, warp prisms function as both mobile troop transport and emergency power source. Though they are fragile, no protoss fleet is complete without them.
Skin/Info/WarpPrismGolden=古代聖堂武士的傳輸稜鏡有特殊的水晶晶格，有時會反射出經過他們傳送的戰士神經模式。 /// Ancient Templar warp prisms featured a distinctive crystal lattice that would sometimes reflect the neural patterns of the warriors they transport.
Skin/Info/WarpPrismIhanrii=伊翰利傳輸稜鏡逐漸展開，就像一朵在母星山丘上綻放的花朵一般。而這顆母星，現在被當地居民稱作「泰拉朵九號星」。 /// Unfurled, the Ihan-rii warp prism evokes a flower that once covered the hillsides of their homeworld, referred to by its current residents as "Tyrador IX."  
Skin/Info/WarpPrismNerazim=達蘭相位工匠在改良傳輸稜鏡上有重大突破，尼拉辛姆指揮官對這種可以運用虛空能量的相位稜鏡讚譽有加。 /// Daelaam phase-smiths have broken new ground by adapting warp prisms to use Void energy. These variants, known as phase prisms, have already earned great popularity with Nerazim commanders.
Skin/Info/WarpPrismPurifier=淨化者的傳輸稜鏡會在必要時，自動將A.I.人格在不同的機體之間轉移。而且這個效果在戰場上各處都能都能發動。 /// Purifier warp prisms can automatically transfer an AI personality between different shells if needed, and warp prisms enable this to happen anywhere on the battlefield. 
Skin/Info/WarpPrismTaldarim=到底要不要以先進武器來武裝傳輸稜鏡，是艦隊首領之間永遠爭論不休的話題。有些人希望，單純用它們把戰士送到戰場上就好。 /// Arming warp prisms with advanced weaponry is a point of contention among the fleet lords. Some prefer to use them to simply deploy their own warriors onto the battlefield.
Skin/Info/WidowMine=寡婦詭雷最一開始是由維克多‧卡臣斯基所設計出來的，後來逐漸改良成具有超絕殺傷力的致命武器，能對敵人發射防禦飛彈，攻其不備。 /// Initially developed by Victor Kachinsky, the widow mine has been refined into a surprisingly lethal device that can fire defensive missiles against unsuspecting enemies.
Skin/Info/WidowMineCovertOps=由於過去偶爾會發生誤傷意外，因此技術人員在寡婦詭雷上面加裝了更多的合金板，藉此減少事故發生的機率，以及防止意外傷亡。 /// Perplexed by occasional misfires in the past, technicians have added more protective plating to the widow mines to better contain accidents and protect against unintended injuries.
Skin/Info/WidowMineJunker=在數次造成巨大破壞的實驗之後，米拉的傭兵重新設計出了寡婦詭雷，可以承載更多武器和炸藥。 /// After several rounds of heavily destructive experimentation, Mira's mercs redesigned their widow mines to accommodate additional weaponry and explosives.
Skin/Info/WidowMineSilver=儘管寡婦詭雷常常因為血淋淋的意外登上新聞版面，但它簡約亮麗的外表還是吸引了許多泰拉朵九號星的上流社會人士，把它當作居家的寵物。 /// Despite gory accidents that make the news from time to time, sleek and shiny widow mines remain a common pet in the upper-class households of Tyrador IX.
Skin/Info/WidowMineUmojan=尤摩捷工程師對機械總是充滿熱愛，他們還舉辦了打造完美寡婦詭雷的比賽，但等到發現冠軍是個還在努力取得學位的學生以後，所有工程師都震驚了。 /// Always fond of robotics, the Umojan engineers held an exclusive competition to craft the perfect widow mine and were thrilled to discover that the winner was still a student finishing her degree.
Skin/Info/Zealot=狂戰士是戰場上無可比擬的戰鬥單位，經過了數十年的嚴苛訓練，他們的作戰技巧近乎完美。他們那知名的幽能之刃，是由自身的幽能所形成的。 /// Peerless warriors on the battlefield, zealots undergo decades of intense training in order to perfect their combat skills. Their signature psi-blades are formed with their own psionic energy.
Skin/Info/ZealotGolden=有許多狂戰士很快就跟上了高階聖堂武士慶祝神族黃金紀元，以及其藝術和文化成就的風潮。不過這波運動至今尚未受到官方認可。 /// Many zealots were quick to follow the high templar in celebrating the protoss' golden age, along with its artistic and cultural achievements. However, the movement has received no official recognition thus far.
Skin/Info/ZealotIhanrii=伊翰利神族狂戰士相信薩爾納加總有一天會回歸，讓勇敢的戰士們都能受到神的永久祝福。 /// Zealots of the Ihan-rii protoss believe the xel'naga will return one day to bless valiant warriors with eternal godhood.
Skin/Info/ZealotPurifier=儘管哨兵們沒有各自的人格，但在程式設定之下，他們依舊是高貴的戰士，就和狂戰士一樣。 /// Though they do not possess unique personalities, the sentinels are programmed to be noble warriors equal to their zealot brethren.
Skin/Info/ZealotRemastered=為了展現大無畏精神，有許多狂戰士在大戰期間不戴頭盔作戰。但這樣的行為在之後已經被禁止了。 /// To demonstrate their fearlessness, many zealots went without head armor during the Great War. This practice has since been discontinued.
Skin/Info/ZealotTaldarim=在飛升之鍊最底層的成員，同時是最急著想證明自己的人。因此塔達力姆的狂戰士可說是最危險的敵人。 /// The lowest ranking links in the Chain of Ascension are also the ones most eager to prove themselves. A zealot of the Tal'darim is a dangerous foe to face.
Skin/Info/ZealotXPR=雖然秘密議會已經不存在了，但司法官們依舊擁有軍事領袖的地位，始終保持著對達蘭的忠誠。只要神族還存在，他們就會繼續英勇作戰。 /// Though the Conclave no longer exists, the praetors who served as its military leaders are still loyal to the Daelaam. For as long as the protoss live, they will continue to fight with valor.
Skin/Info/Zergling=異化蟲既殘暴又充滿野性，若牠們在某個高等品系的蟲族控制下大舉進攻，危險性不可輕忽。 /// Savage and feral, zerglings are most dangerous when attacking in large groups that are controlled by a larger and more advanced strain of zerg.
Skin/Info/ZerglingMecha=儘管它們的外觀和行為都很像異化蟲，但這種擬態異化蟲純粹由機械打造而成，並且仰賴電力，而非吸收敵人的DNA做為動力來源。 /// Though they look and act just like zerglings, the simulants are purely mechanical reproductions that run wholly on electrical power sources, rather than absorbing the DNA of their enemies.
Skin/Info/ZerglingPrimal=某些較小型的原生異化蟲，與蟲群中的同類相當類似，甚至連攻擊的方式都非常接近。 /// Some of the smaller primal zerglings have been known to resemble their counterparts in the Swarm, even to the point where they possess similar attack capabilities.
Skin/Info/ZerglingRCZ=蟲族的神經系統很容易過度活化，這讓地獄犬的工程師必須再加裝兩組天線，才能正確控制牠們。 /// Zergling nervous systems are so hyperactive that Cerberus engineers had to affix two antennas to control their movement properly.
Skin/Info/ZerglingWebby=減少異化蟲的基因組數量，造成意料之外的結果。 利維坦群落的異化蟲快速成長並非刻意進化而成的，而是DNA極為簡化後的副作用。 /// The reduction of the zergling genome has had unpredictable results. The growths present on Leviathan zerglings are not intentionally evolved, but a byproduct of their extremely simplified DNA.
Skin/Info/ZerglingXPR=異化蟲是平均壽命最短的蟲族。要是有能夠延長牠們壽命的突變基因，都值得詳加觀察與分析。 /// Few zerg have a shorter life expectancy than the zergling. Any mutation that appears to increase that life expectancy is considered worthy of observation and analysis.

Switcher/IDS_MISSING_INSTRUCTION=無法執行《星海爭霸II》64位元客戶端。您的處理器不符合最低系統需求，需要可支援CMPXCHG16B指令的處理器。請改為執行32位元客戶端。 /// Unable to run StarCraft II 64 bit client. Processor does not meet minimum system requirements. CMPXCHG16B instruction support is required. Please run the 32 bit client instead.
Switcher/IDS_MISSING_SSE=無法執行《星海爭霸II》。您的處理器不符合最低系統需求，需要使用可支援SSE／SSE2的處理器。 /// Unable to run StarCraft II. Processor does not meet minimum system requirements. SSE/SSE2 support is required.

UI/HelpGameMechanic_DestructibleRocks_Description=<ul indent="2" text="•"><li>這些岩石被放置在特定的位置上，以防止建造建築或者阻擋行進的路徑。</li><li>由於它們擁有大量生命值與護甲值，因此需要花費一番功夫才能摧毀它們。</li><li>可破壞的岩石一旦被摧毀後就無法修復或者重新建造。</li></ul> /// <ul indent="2" text="•"><li>These rocks are placed in areas to prevent construction or block paths.</li><li>They take some effort to destroy due to their increased life and armor.</li><li>Destructible rocks cannot be repaired, or reconstructed once destroyed.</li></ul>

UI/HelpGameMechanic_FogOfWar_Description=<ul indent="2" text="•"><li>戰爭迷霧會限制玩家只能看到其單位與建築可見的視野。</li><li>當玩家失去某區域的視野，就無法看見其中的敵方單位，但敵方建築仍會在原地點顯示其最後被看見的狀態與位置。</li><li>如果玩家被視野外的敵人攻擊時，這些攻擊單位會在戰爭迷霧中暫時現形，但是玩家必須擁有完整視野才能展開反擊。例如：當玩家的單位被視野外的攻城坦克攻擊時，展開攻擊的攻城坦克會在戰爭迷霧中暫時現形。</li></ul> /// <ul indent="2" text="•"><li>Fog of War limits players' vision to what their units and structures can see.</li><li>When a player loses vision of an area, enemy units can't be seen and structures are shown in the last seen state and location.</li><li>If a player is attacked by an enemy they can't see, they will be shown the attacking unit but can't retaliate until they have vision. Example: If a siege tank is attacking outside of your vision, the siege tank is displayed briefly through the fog of war.</li></ul>
UI/HelpGameMechanic_FogOfWar_Name=戰爭迷霧 /// Fog of War
UI/HelpGameMechanic_HighLowGround_Description=<ul indent="2" text="•"><li>你必須擁有高地的視野才能攻擊高地上的敵人。</li><li>高地上的單位在攻擊你時會在戰爭迷霧中現形，但你必須擁有該處高地的視野才能展開反擊。</li><li>若想獲得高地的視野，你必須將地面部隊移動至高地上，或者利用飛行單位來獲得視野。</li></ul></s> /// <ul indent="2" text="•"><li>You must have vision of the high ground in order to attack units on a higher cliff level.</li><li>Units on high ground appear through the fog of war if they attack you, but you can't counterattack unless you have vision of the high ground.</li><li>To gain vision of the high ground, you need a ground unit on the high ground or a flying unit to act as a spotter.</li></ul></s>
UI/HelpGameMechanic_HighLowGround_Name=地形高低 /// High & Low Ground

UI/HelpGameMechanic_LineOfSight_Description=<ul indent="2" text="•"><li>這些視野遮蔽物件會阻隔地面單位的視野，讓他們無法獲得物件後方的視野。</li><li>地面單位必須待在視野遮蔽物件裡頭或者穿越這些物件才能獲得另一頭的視野。</li><li>空中單位不會受到影響，因此可以利用他們來查看視野遮蔽物件所阻隔的視野。</li></ul> /// <ul indent="2" text="•"><li>These sight blockers hide whatever is behind them from ground units.</li><li>Ground units must stand inside or walk through sight blockers to see what is on the other side.</li><li>Air units are not affected and can act as spotters for ground units to see through or into the sight blockers.</li></ul>
UI/HelpGameMechanic_LineOfSight_Name=煙霧遮蔽與樹叢 /// Smoke Billows & Bushes
UI/HelpGameMechanic_Minerals_Description=<ul indent="2" text="•"><li>藍色水晶簇是一般晶礦，每次能採集5個單位的晶礦。</li><li>生產兩個工作單位採集每塊晶礦。</li><li>即使你已經指派三個工作單位採集一塊晶礦，礦騾依然可以增加你的收入。</li><li>晶礦一旦耗盡即無法採集。</li></ul> /// <ul indent="2" text="•"><li>Mineral Fields are blue crystals which yield 5 minerals when harvested by workers.</li><li>Create two workers to gather from each Mineral Field.</li><li>MULEs will always generate income, even if you have three workers harvesting a Mineral Field.</li><li>Once a Mineral Field is depleted, it can no longer be harvested from.</li></ul>

UI/HelpGameMechanic_ReducedMineralFields_Description=<ul indent="2" text="•"><li>低產量晶礦場能自訂可採集的晶礦量，範圍為1-450點。</li><li>這些晶礦場可以放置在路徑上，產生阻擋效果。</li><li>工作單位採集完這些晶礦，就能打開新的區域或路徑。</li></ul> /// <ul indent="2" text="•"><li>Reduced Mineral Fields are Mineral Fields that can have a custom value from 1-450.</li><li>These mineral fields are placed in areas to block paths.</li><li>Workers can harvest these minerals to open up new areas or paths.</li></ul>

UI/HelpGameMechanic_VespeneGeysers_Description=<ul indent="2" text="•"><li>必須先在高能瓦斯湧源上建造瓦斯精煉廠、瓦斯處理廠或瓦斯萃取巢才能派遣工作單位採集高能瓦斯。</li><li>生產三個工作單位採集每個高能瓦斯湧源。</li><li>高能瓦斯湧源一旦耗盡即無法採集瓦斯。</li></ul> /// <ul indent="2" text="•"><li>Vespene Geysers require a Refinery, Assimilator, or Extractor to be created on them before workers can harvest vespene gas.</li><li>Create three workers to gather from each Vespene Geyser.</li><li>Once a Vespene Geyser is depleted, it can no longer be harvested from.</li></ul>

A terrible power has reawakened, forcing Raynor to make a fateful choice between pursuing his vendetta -- or fighting for the survival of mankind.</s>
